jp_name: あべこべクリーム Abekobe Kurīmu
description: When applied to the skin, any hot or cold sensation the skin felt will be the opposite. For example, if a person applied the Abekobe Cream to their skin, and they went out to in the snow wearing only one layer of cloth, they will feel warm instead of cold. Another example is, if they get burned or scalded, they will be frozen instead.
appears_in: Doraemon: Nobita's New Great Adventure into the Underworld – The Seven Magic Users
Move Fast, Doraemon! The Galactic Grandprix

jp_name: アベコンベ
description:
When the head of the Abekonbe hits an object, either the object's function, position or action will be reversed. For example, if the Abekonbe is used on a refrigerator, the refrigerator will be hot instead of cold. Another example is, if used on something light, it will become heavy instead.
The Abekonbe's effect is rather complicated, as multiple aspects of the object may be reversed.

jp_name: アクション連動マット "Akushon rendō matto"
description: To use this gadget. First, you must attach a green star chip to the desired object. The attached star chip will light up and connect to a VR (Virtual reality). Then you can move the object according to your body movements by standing on the dancing mattress such as doing a breakdance.

jp_name: 空気砲 Kūki-hō
description:
This looks like a miniature muzzle of a real cannon with a tiny iron sight.
The Air Cannon fires blasts of pressurized air at the target with an average velocity, requiring electrical energy to function. Impact of its munitions can have varying effects depending on the target.
In Doraemon: Nobita's Treasure Island, it is revealed that the cannon's air projectile can be blocked via slicing it as shown when Vivi easily stopped the attack with her blade.
The Air Cannon is one of Nobita's gadgets. It is his second gadget and is obtained when Doraemon and Nobita went into the first dungeon. The Air Cannon is a powerful weapon, but unlike the other guns-like gadget Nobita has in the game, he cannot fire it three times consecutively. He also cannot fire it while running, because of its high recoil and does not work in water sections. One hit from the Air Cannon can defeat a normal enemy with one hit, except for the Digging Hermitcrab, which needs to be shot 2 times.
The Air Cannon is listed under number 20 out of 61 gadgets in the game.
The Air Cannon is one of the first two gadgets obtained. It is charged by holding the action button and shoot by releasing it. You cannot move when attacking.
Air Cannon is a gadget that we second obtained through the game. It shuffles things to your advantage.
The Air Cannon as Water elemental Melee weapons and also a good main hand choice. Obtained from Doramon collaboration event.
appears_in: A Beautiful Girl that Nobita Loved
The Great Pirate Decisive Battle ~Love Romance of the Southern Sea~
Doraemon: New Nobita's Great Demon ~Peko and the Exploration Party of 5~
Doraemon: Nobita and the Winged Braves

jp_name: エアコンフォト Eakonfoto
description: The Air Conditioning Photo has the same function as the Voodoo Camera, but in photo form.
appears_in: The Snow is Hot! The Air Conditioning Photo

jp_name: 空気クレヨン Kūki Kureyon
description: This gadget appears to resemble a perfectly normal crayon, but is used to make drawings and other markings on areas of thin air.
appears_in: Nobita and the Island of Miracles ~Animal Adventure~

jp_name: (空気ピストル) - (空気ピストルのくすり)
description:
The Air Pistol is equipped on a person's finger. When they point out their finger towards an object or person, they can shoot by shouting "Bang!". The Air Pistol has lesser recoil, but also has shorter range and power when compared to the larger Air Cannon. The Air Pistol has a range of around 10 meters (about 35 feet).
While the Medicine Air Pistol is rather similar to it, the Medicine Air Pistol looks like a big bullet. It stores a type of liquid that can be used as artillery when applied on one's finger. When a non-living thing is hit, they'll simply be pushed or blown away, but some objects may break, like a branch, leaf, or fruit. However, when living things like humans, animals and robots (that may sleep) are hit by the bullets, they fall asleep (anesthesia) or fall down. The Air Bullets function like paralysis darts.
Air Pistol Medicine in DS game.The Air Pistol (Shaped like a bullet) is used in the Challenge game "けんじゅうおう コンテスト"(Kenju Contest). The player controls Nobita, and may have up to 10 bullets at a time. To shoot, a player must shout into the microphone (the game prompts a shout of "Bang!", but any word is fine). The bullets can be blocked if they hit each other. When a character of the player is hit, they'll fall asleep, unable to wake up until the next game. NPC characters have unlimited bullets.
When replayed in the Main Menu, the Kenju Contest is only played versus other players in Wireless Communication.
The Air Pistol is listed under number 18 out of 61 gadgets in the game.

jp_name: アラビンのランプ Arabin'no Ranpu
description:
The Aladdin's Lamp summons the smoke genie that will grant his master any wishes they want. Although they are incredibly obedient and "resourceful", the genie's method of granting his master's wishes are radical, and not magical at all. For example, when Nobita asked the genie to finish up his homework, the genie went to see Sensei, and forced him to do the homework, as the genie doesn't know how to. The genie will return to his lamp after one wish "has been granted".
For serious wishes such as finding one million yen, the genie will threaten everyone in order to grant the user's "serious wishes".
appears_in: Chapter 15:A Ghost of the Lamp's Smoke
The Magic Lamp without a Genie

jp_name: オールシーズンバッジ Ōru Shīzun Bajji
description:
There is one dial and four different seasons. Those seasons are: Summer, Winter, Autumn and Spring.
It is used to change the season to another season of a specific place with the radius of 100 meters.
Just spin the dial to whichever season you want to have and this gadget will activate that season in your environment.
This gadget is not meant to be played with since if we change the weather too much it can cause serious trouble. If more badges were set, it can cause serious weather troubles too.
appears_in: Nobita's New Great Adventure into the Underworld – The Seven Magic Users

jp_name: オールマイティーパス Ōrumaitīpasu
description:
This gadget is used to make the user pass into any place.
Also, this gadget will expire on the expiry date.
appears_in: I've Got a Spare Fourth Dimensional Pocket

jp_name: 動物ライト Dōbutsu Raito
description: You just need to beam the person with the light, then the person will turn into an animal.

jp_name: 動物変身ステッキ Dōbutsu Henshin Sutekki
description: It is used to transform a person into an animal. The transformation into an animal depends on what animal the user thinks. The transformation can be reverted when Release Lip is used.

jp_name: 先取り約束機 Sakidori Yakusoku-ki
description: In case of an emergency, a user may need this. Simply ask something in the machine (like take a bath or become full from eating) and it will become true. However, you need to fulfill the promise to do it in reality within a span of time stated in the promise, else the action itself would be unraveled and treated as never happened e.g. you'll become more smelly/hungry than usual.
appears_in: Nobita and the Haunts of Evil
The New Nobita's Great Demon ~Peko and the Exploration Party of 5~
Doraemon: New Nobita's Great Demon ~Peko and the Exploration Party of 5~

jp_name: なんでもバイオリン "Nandemo Baiorin"
description:
Anything is Violin (なんでもバイオリン Nandemo Baiorin), is a one of gadget owned by Doraemon.
Shizuka accidently broke her violin while she was practicing. In order to make her happy, Nobita ask Doraemon to do something good for her, So Doraemon takes out a "Anything is Violin" to make Shizuka happy again. Any object rubbed by this tool Will turn into like a sound of original violin, such as a racket, ballon, cotton candy, and even Shizuka most favorite food is Called Roasted sweet potatos.

jp_name: なんでもそうじゅう機 Nan demo sōjū-ki
description: It can make anything into a form of transport (including an ice cream cap).

jp_name: どこでも大ほう, Doko Demo Taihō
description:
Nobita NobiIt looks like a normal cannon. Only it's functions/features are different.
A user can use this gadget to go wherever they want to go. To do that they have to get inside this cannon tube while another person helps to find the desired location. After they have found the location, they pull the rope and the user inside the canon will blast off to that location very speedily.
appears_in: I've Got a Spare Fourth Dimensional Pocket/2005 Anime

jp_name: まほうのじゃぐち, Mahōno jaguchi
description: You can drink any liquid anywhere that has a wall.
appears_in: Doraemon Mini Theater: The Anywhere Tap

jp_name: どこでもきっぷ, Doko demo kippu
description: You must write the name of a place in the ticket then color it in a door which will take you to that place.
appears_in: Chapter 087:A Mysterious Swimming In The Sea

jp_name: やりくりアリ Yarikuri ari
description: This gadget allows users to reorganize old things to new things. First, the user has to say out what the user wants to the microphone, then many ants will come out. Those ants are the future recycle robot, they will collect materials to make the user’s new thing, For example, making a toy will require metal and plastic. After collecting enough materials, those materials will be melted or crushed to make the new thing.

jp_name: 選挙(せんきょ)ケン Senkyo Ken
description:
The Ballot Dog is one of Doraemon's gadgets.
The gadget allows users to hold a democratic election. Users will have to express their interest to the Ballot Dog to run in the election. Whenever a candidate breaks a rule (such as bribery or personal attack), he can emit a lightning bolt to stop the person.
The Ballot Dog not only serves as a ballot box where voters can feed their vote into its mouth, but also as a returning officer to announce the results.
appears_in: Vote for the Boss of the Brats!

jp_name: たけのこ型テントセット "Take no ko-gata tento setto"
description: To make this bamboo shoot tent. First, you must bury this bamboo shoot-shaped tent into the ground. Second, water this plant with lots of water. Then wait wait for an hour until grow a bamboo shoot tent it can be occupied. After camping, use the spray to restore it, and this bamboo shoot is edible.

jp_name: バショー扇Bashō Sen or Bashō Ōgi
description:
Bashō Sen or Bashō ŌgiThe Basho Sen can create a strong wind depending on how the user swings it. If they swing it gently, they may create a pleasant yet fairly strong breeze. If they swing it violently, a strong gust of wind instead will be conjured. It is possible to create a whirlwind or small tornado, but this requires a precise and specific technique.
The Basho Sen is one of Doraemon's Action Gadget, and his fourth one. It is obtained when the party arrives at the Rire of Guidance(ミチビキのリーレ). Simply pressing Y once will make Doraemon swing it quickly, capable of blowing away normal enemies with ease. Pressing Y and charging it to the fullest allows Doraemon to swing and creates a strong gust that will blow away any enemies(except bosses) in the gust. Unlike in the series and movies, the Basho Sen in this game cannot create gusts that would reach the whole screen.
The Basho Sen is listed under number 42 out of 61 gadgets in the game.
Basho-Sen, featured on the cover of volume-38 Doraemon manga.
appears_in: Battle! Cat-Model Robots VS Dog-Model Robots
Thank God for the Prison Break

jp_name: General InformationFunctionsDetails
description:
Bartering Machine in its extended form.It is a pink drum-like gadget with two robotic gloved hands that help in the barter. It has a slit which acts as its mouth, and the only thing it can say is "Give! Give!" in a robotic voice. When it urges the one disagreeing, it has a flexible pipe fitted to its bottom that can extend out and physically approach both the sides.
It is used to convince two people to make a barter decision even if either or both of them are unwilling to. The person against is forced to hand their export to the robot, while the other barterer hands their, to the other hand of the gadget. The robot then exchanges its hand position to give both their desired items.
In the episode, it was used by Doraemon to force the witch to give Mermaid Princess the potion which would give her anthropomorphic legs, in exchange of a headwear-starfish worn by the princess, even though the witch demanded for her melodious voice.

jp_name: なりきりケイドロセット Narikiri Keidoro Setto
description:
The set consists of various gadgets to play the 22nd century version of Tag.
Police (It)
Thief
appears_in: Nobi the Thief is Somewhat Arrested!

jp_name: ビッグライト Bigguraito
description:
When used, Big Light fires a laser which temporarily increases the mass and space occupied by the target to a certain extent for an unspecified amount of time. 
Doraemon uses the Magnify Ray in The Nobi Family's Giant Tunafish.
appears_in: A Visitor from the Country of the Future/U.S. English dub
Super Exciting! Grand Racing on the Ever-Changing Track
Nobita's Great Adventure into the Underworld

jp_name: 鳩キャップ Hato kyappu鶏キャップ Niwatori kyappu雀キャップ Suzume kyappu白鳥キャップ Hakuchō kyappuみみずくキャップ Mimizuku kyappuウッドペッカーキャップ Uddopekkā kyappuキングフィッシュキャップ Kingufisshu kyappu鸚鵡キャップ Ōmu kyappu鷲キャップ Washi kyappu信天翁キャップ Ahōdori kyappu
description:
Bird Caps (バードキャップ)  is a set of Doraemon's gadget.

The Pigeon Cap is the Pigeon-like cap. Used to fly like a pigeon.

The Chicken Cap is the Chicken-like cap. This cap can't be used for flying.

The Sparrow Cap is the Sparrow-like cap. Used to fly like a sparrow.

The Swan Cap is the Swan-like cap. Used to fly like a swan. Sometimes the user that uses this cap will migrate with other swans.

The Owl Cap is the Owl-like cap. Used to fly like an owl. Owls are nocturnal birds so they can only fly at night. Same with this cap that can only be used at night time.

The Woodpecker Cap is the Woodpecker-like cap. The user will always bang his head in the tree, like a woodpecker while pecking the tree.

The Kingfisher Cap is the Kingfisher-like cap. Used to fly like a Kingfisher. Sometimes when the user sees the river, he will immediately jump into the river.

The Parrot Cap is the Parrot-like cap. The user will mimic the spoken language.

The Eagle Cap is the Eagle-like cap. Used to fly like an eagle.

The Albatross Cap is the Albatross-like cap. Used to fly like an Albatross.

jp_name: 鳥よせ笛, Tori Yose Fue
description: By blowing into the Bird Whistle, one can attract birds.

jp_name: 黒コショウ Kuro Koshō
description: It works just like a normal black pepper.

jp_name: モーテン星 Mōten Hoshi
description:
It appears to be a set of stickers that looks like orange stars with a white round with a particular green dot at the center.
By wearing this gadget, the user becomes 'invisible' through the physiological effect of other people's blind spot. Technically, the wearer enters the looker's blind spot thus becomes 'invisible in their line of sight. This gadget works by distorting the light that falls and reflected from the wearer to pass by the looker's focal points, making them virtually persists in the blind spot area. This gadget's effect will be expired after an hour. Despite the user not being visible others, it's possible to track down their location through other sense such as smell.
appears_in: Nobita's New Great Adventure into the Underworld – The Seven Magic Users

jp_name: からだポソプ Karada ponpu
description: Any body parts that is pumped by the tool gets enlarged, but gets smaller once the pump is removed from the body part. The part enlarged however does not increase the person's strength or abilities in any form, merely increases the size.

jp_name: 地球はかいばくだん Chikyū Hakai Bakudan
description:
As it was never used, next to nothing is known about this weapon.
Doraemon has implied this as a weapon of mass destruction capable of devastating a large area with a powerful, gargantuan blast. It also has a contact fuse that activates upon physical damage.
appears_in: Nobita and the New Steel Troops ~Angel Wings~
Only Four More Hours Until the Mice Are Driven Away
It's the Year of the Mouse! Doraemon
It's the Year of the Mouse! Doraemon

jp_name: オトコンナ Otokon'na
description: Spreading it around, the gadget changes boys into sissies and girls into tomboys. The target's biological gender is unaffected.
appears_in: Chapter 143:When Will You Take Boy Girl?

jp_name: ムシムシヒーローベルト Mushimushi Hīrō Beruto
description: Whenever an insect goes nearer to the user, the user will have the abilities regarding to the insect.

jp_name: 虫スカン
description:
Bug Off is a disgusting substance that spreads its intolerable scent everywhere via fumes and radiation, which is similar to tear gas, effectively forcing most others away.
In Stand by Me Doraemon, the potion seems to be capable of not only creating disgusting subtance but also creating winds that makes it more advanced than other adaptations.
However, it is possible for the user to be poisoned if a significant quantity of it has been ingested or otherwise applied.
Wearing it, the user's sense of hearing is heightened immensely, allowing them to hear sounds much easier.
The Cancellation Eraser is for revoking the effect of the gadget pen, Face-Doodling Pen.

jp_name: 世話やきロープ "Sewa yaki rōpu"
description: Just like the name, tihis gadget will take care of you. It can be shaped into anything, and will accompany you anywhere, anywhe without worrying about it.

jp_name: キャッチグローブ
description:
The Catch Glove is a gadget that belongs to Doraemon.
It helps it's user to catch anything automatically, even if the user is not good in catching.

jp_name: チアリーダー手袋 Chiarīdā Tebukuro
description:
The gadget is actually a pair of mittens that expand into pom-poms when someone places them over (or toss them onto) their hands, and can be used by anyone. If the user cheers for another person, said person will somehow instantly win whatever competition they are currently in. They can't be removed unless the targeted person emerges victorious.
The Cheerleader Gloves is one of Shizuka's gadget as an Assist Character. When used, Shizuka appears alongside Nobita and Doraemon and cheers them along as she runs around cheering with them. While she is cheering, she gradually restores their health over time. She will follow Nobita and Doraemon around and jump across ledges with them. Note that she is vulnerable to attacks as well as falling into pits which will instantly dispatch her.
appears_in: Doraemon: Nobita's Legend of the Sun King
Nobita and the Island of Miracles ~Animal Adventure~
Summoning in Victory with the Cheerleader Gloves

jp_name: カチンカチンライト Kachinkachin Raito
description: The Coagulation Light's energy solidifies the target for 5 minutes, preventing it from experiencing any state of change for the entire duration of the effect. Solidified items may exhibit properties absent from the original counterpart.
appears_in: All the Way From the Country of the Future
Doraemon: Nobita Drifts in the Universe
All the Way From the Country of the Future
Doraemon: Nobita Drifts in the Universe

jp_name: 合体ノリ Gattainori
description: This gadget is used to make a fusion with something that touched after spreading the cream on hand.

jp_name: General InformationFunctionsDetails
description: This gadget grants cats the ability to attract customers. After eating Come Come Cat Food, the cat can attract customers. The effect of the gadget however, is over after attracting three customers.
appears_in: Would You Like To Adopt Doraemon?

jp_name: こいこいマーク Koi Koi Māku
description: Same as the Come Come Cat, the gadget forcefully pulls a person depending on the direction.
appears_in: Nobita and the Island of Miracles ~Animal Adventure~

jp_name: カムカムキャット Kamu Kamu Kyatto
description: This gadget makes the target come to a person's house. It can also be used to pull in people in the direction it is facing. The Come Come Cat is useful for attracting customers, in a rather 'forceful' way. Its function is the opposite of the Go Go Dog.
appears_in: Vote for the Boss of the Brats!
Doraemon: Nobita and the Island of Miracles ~Animal Adventure~

jp_name: 雲固めガス
description: In Movie:Doraemon: Nobita and the Kingdom of Clouds (1979 anime)Stand by Me Doraemon (2005 anime)In Anime:The Recital of Blue Moon NightWith this, a person can walk or jump on clouds with just a spray. However, too much of this will cause the cloud to be very bouncy.
appears_in: Doraemon: Nobita and the Kingdom of Clouds
The Recital of Blue Moon Night

eng_name: Conveyor Belt Sushi of People I Wanna See
jp_name: 会(あ)いたいヒト回転(かいてん)寿司(すし) Aitai Hito Kaiten Sushi
description:
Just say the name of a person or group of people that you want to see to the microphone. They will automatically be teleported and appear on the plates of the conveyor belt. Then you can see them for a limited time. A user can do it 10 times and after that, the gadget will be useless.
When calling the person or group of people, the users have to be specific as possible to prevent a full list of people with the same name or from the same place from coming out. They will have to push the cancel button to end the list. When the person or group of people are called, their appearance the moment before they are called will be reflected on the conveyor belt (for example, Uncle Heisuke is in the middle of changing his clothes before he was called the first time). While users may deliver items to the person or group of people or receive items from them, they cannot pull them out from the conveyor belt.
Doraemon bought the gadget during the promotional period, and hence there was an extra call making the maximum number of calls allowed to 11 (Normally during the promotional period, if you buy 10 bentos of sushi you get another one free).
appears_in: Revolving Sushi of People I Wanna See

jp_name: コピーロボット
description:
The robot initially appears as a blank humanoid puppet with a red, nose-like button as its switch, used for startup and shutdown. 
It can mimic multiple attributes of its target, from appearance and physiology to psychology and sentience. On top of the accuracy deficiencies, however, it is also vulnerable to mechanical defects (impacts, etc), both of which can greatly impede its performance.
appears_in: I Don't Like Shizuka-chan Being Like This!
Doraemon: Yume Dorobou to 7 Nin no Gozansu

jp_name: 暗記 パン, Anki Pan
description:
To use the Copying Toast, one should press one side of the toast on a book with either text or pictures. The text or picture will then be 'printed' (in the bread's case, 'sticks onto it') on the toast. Eating the toast later will allow the eater to remember whatever content that has been printed on the toast.
The user will forget the content (if they never did memorize it normally) if the toasts are expelled out from their system. Like how Nobita had a stomach ache and had to 'expel' them into the toilet, he forgets everything printed on the toasts.
appears_in: Doraemon Wii: Secret Tool King Tournament

jp_name: わたがし雲メーカー Wataga shi kumo mēkā
description:
To use this gadget, the user must put it into a cloud, then add their favorite flavors, foods and even the drinks. Finally, press the button on the gadget to create it and eat these clouds.
This cotton candy is almost absent when eating, because it is naturally cloudy so users can eat as much as they like.

jp_name: クロス・スイッチ
description:
The user has to point the gadget at the other person and press the red button. This will make that person switch their role in life. To switch back, the user needs to press the red button again.
Humorously enough, not all the roles and actions are switched by the gadget e.g. Shizuka will be the one to scream when Nobita bathes even though she is the one who walks in at that moment.
appears_in: This Road, That Road, and The Easy Road/1979 Anime
This Road, That Road, and The Easy Road/2005 Anime

jp_name: 危険爆弾  Kiken bakudan
description: The Danger Bomb detonates after a set fuse time when thrown or upon being remotely triggered. The explosion is capable of destroying entire celestial entities the size of Earth as well as smaller meteors. The bomb itself is small, as it can be held in human hands.
appears_in: A Visitor from the Country of the Future

jp_name: おとりロボット Otori Robotto
description:
Simply place it in the ground and they will lure out the predator from its prey. They are capable of saying Wasshoi (ワッショイ！) while functioning, which the word is commonly shouted during festivals.
In the movie Nobita and the Island of Miracles ~Animal Adventure~, it introduces the more upgraded version, the Decoy Robot DX (おとりロボットＤＸ Otori Robotto Derakkusu) which the gadget has a set of three robots instead of just only one.
appears_in: Nobita and the Island of Miracles ~Animal Adventure~

jp_name: 変形(へんけい)ライト Henkei raito
description:
The gadget has the ability to change the shape of an object to quadrilateral, in particular, squares and rectangles.
Doraemon uses the flashlight to change the shape of Nobita and Tamako's glasses to square. But in the next scene where she prepares dinner, their glasses were reverted back to round.

jp_name: おくれカメラ Okure Kamera
description: This camera takes pictures of things that have happened earlier.
appears_in: Long Ago, Mom Was Just Like Nobita!?

jp_name: 配達ラケット Haitatsu Raketto
description: Doraemon demonstrating the gadgetThe user must say first the destination of the specific object. Then he/she hits the object to its destination. The gadget can hit anything no matter of its size.

jp_name: 出前 電話 "Demae Denwa"
description:
Delivery Telephone is one of Doraemon gadget 
With this phone we can ask to deliver anything. Just dial the telephone number, pick up the receiver and say what you want to deliver. then the goods will be delivered immediately according to our request. Apart from delivering goods, you can ask to deliver the person.

jp_name: デラックスライト/ゴージャスライト
description:
In 1979 animeWhen the light is shined on a regular object, it becomes a "deluxe" object (an example is a regular desk chair turned into an executive chair), to make the object regular again, the user must have the light shined on it again.
Mrs.Goda's outfit transformed into royal gownIn the 1979 episode, the gadget is used to transform Gian's house into an elegant manor as Gian doesn't want Jaiko to embarrass her foreign friend. At the end of the episode, Nobita accidentally transforms Mrs. Goda's cloth into an elegant royal gown.
In the 2005 remake, the following become deluxified:

jp_name: ＤＸ列車セット Derakkusu Ressha Setto
description:
Deluxe Train Set  (ＤＸ列車セット) is a gadget that can make a house into a train.
Put this gadget into the house. The house will be a train and can move anywhere by following the railroad.
appears_in: Nobita Express and the Mystery of the Train Hunter

jp_name: デビルカード Debiru Kādo
description:
By using this gadget one can gain money by signing a deal with the devil which lives in it. After the deal is done, when someone shakes the card, 300 yens fell from it every time. For every three hundred yens taken out from the card, the one who dealt will get shorter by one millimeter in height.
If too much money is taken out from the card, the dealer might turn shorter like an ant or possibly disappear at 12AM.
Chapter 403:Devil Card

jp_name: どくさいスイッチ
description:
In the future lived a powerful dictator who ruled the whole world. The dictator's power was used to control the citizens by ordering them to follow the same ideology. Anyone who opposed or obstructed the dictator were erased off the face of the earth with the switch. In this way, the whole world would go according to the way that the dictator wants it to be. In the scene before the last scene of the episode "The Dictator Switch", Doraemon reveals that this gadget was not created for dictators, but was rather created to teach people a lesson that becoming a dictator is bad.
The switch is capable of removing whatever subjects from existence at the user's demand (including their traces of existence and relevant memories), and the effect can be undone by pressing it again.
Doraemon cannot be despawned by the Dictator Switch and is immune to all of its effects.

jp_name: お医者さんカバン Oishasankaban
description: A bag with a sensor which attaches to a patient and can diagnose any illness they may have. It can also dispense the medicine needed to cure their illness.
appears_in: Doraemon: Nobita and the New Steel Troops ~Winged Angels~
Nobita and the Kingdom of Clouds

jp_name: ドンブラ粉 "Donbura-ko"
description: Donbura powder or Swimming powder has a multifunctional purpose, if you use this powder to your body, you can swim or dive in the ground, if you use this tool to a board or cardboard, it can floating on the ground like on top a water. This powder can also sink an object in the ground
appears_in: Doraemon: Nobita and the Birth of Japan 2016
Doraemon: Nobita and the Birth of Japan 2016

jp_name: ドラキュラセット Dorakyura Setto
description:
To use it, the user must put on the fangs and cape, allow the user to transform into a small vampire bat. The user, in bat form, then bites the target neck and wipe the memory with only the chosen memory being wiped and the bite will leave no mark. Other functions of this gadget include flight and open the locked window.
Apparently, despite the appearance as a kid's toy set, this gadget may be used in spying and infiltration.

jp_name: ツモリガン "Tsumorigan"
description: If you fire this gun at the target person. then the person will immediately fall asleep and have a sweet dream, as if he was doing what he wanted to do. The target will wake up if all the things in his dream have been done.
appears_in: Nobita and the Greek Cake Legend

jp_name: 夢はしご Yume hashigo
description:
The user can use this gadget to go to anyone else's dream as they want.
As revealed in The Doraemons Special manga the user, after entering the dream world, can't escape back to the real world after The Nightmare Eater Baku appeared. The same user can't even go to another person's dream unless Baku escaped to the real world and was captured.

jp_name: 夢はしご Yume Hashigo
description: It's used for making the user move into someone's dream.

jp_name: ユメテレビ
description:
As a TV gadget, it shows other people's dreams. Changing the channel changes the direction and distance the TV scans for, allowing you to see anyone's dreams.
If the monitor of the gadget is destroyed, this will allow the enemy of anyone's dreams you watched to pop up to the real world and cause havoc. However, this has not happened.

jp_name: ゆめふうりん
description:
The Dream Bell can only be used on sleeping people (to some extent, those who are unconscious or half-asleep or in a trance are excluded).
The user may call a person's name while ringing the Dream Bell. They will rise and sleepwalk (somnambulism) towards the Dream Bell's user. Although rather slow, they may perform various physical activities like playing soccer and jumping rope. Even though the person is practically still sleeping, their personality is still similar as they are awake. A person summoned by the Dream Bell doesn't seem to be able to speak properly, as sleep talking is always an unclear speech (often in a form of mumble).
appears_in: Nobita and the Knights of Dinosaurs
Gian Makes an Appearance on TV
We're Gonna Go Flower Watching, No Matter What

jp_name: きせかえカメラ Kise kae kamera
description:
Past models of this item can be seen in Doraemon: Nobita's Secret Gadget Museum, which resemble 19th century cameras.
The Dress Up Camera is able to override the person's attire with whatever image inserted inside it, seemingly destroying the ammunition in the process.
This item appears to be only usable on humanoid entities and not other types of machines & structures such as cars & houses, and spawned clothing may or may not match the size of eligible targets. It also cannot affect the casing of mechanical automatons but instead adds clothing to them (I.E. Doraemon). Additionally, it is able to affect multiple individuals at once, but may result in mismatches when mixed ammunition has been inserted. If fired while damaged or with blanks/no ammunition, the camera may also malfunction and remove all clothing on the target, effectively rendering them naked.
Nudity resulted from this item is never seen on-screen for rating reasons, but has been implied multiple times:
In several censored versions, due to rating regulations concerning nudity this item leaves the target with underwear on when fired with blanks, and automatically grants them some if they don't have any. There were also cases where the item is cut entirely.
appears_in: Giant Monster of the Uninhabited Island
The Mystery of the Pyramids!? The Great Egyptian Adventure
Doraemon: New Nobita's Great Demon ~Peko and the Exploration Party of 5~
Nobita and the Birth of Japan 2016

jp_name: ゆうれいの干物 Yūrei no himono
description: It is used to scare someone. This gadget can be used when exposed to water. Once you pour water on it, it will expand.

jp_name: フエルミラー Fuerumira
description:
Duplicate Mirror is one of a Doraemon gadgets.
You can duplicate whatever things you want it by showing it into the mirror, except for money. Because it is a mirror, the results will be reversed and it won't be able to be used. But be careful!, if you forget to turn off this gadget, something bad Will happen. Just like Nobita, he was forced into the world of a mirror by mirror Nobita himself.

jp_name: E.S.P 訓練ボックス Esupa Kunren Bokkusu
description: This gadget is used for bringing 3 different psychic abilities out in the user, but it takes years to master them.

jp_name: 地球エレベーター
description: This gadget is used to move through the hole to the Earth.

jp_name: こだまラッカー Kodama rakkā
description:
Just spray the gadget on and it will produce an echo; making it seem like someone's responding even if there is no one there.
This gadget can be removed using its remover.

jp_name: エネルギーバルブ Enerugī Barubu
description: This gadget is used to increase the usual flow of energy.

jp_name: General InformationFunctionsDetails
description:
Essence Parts (Japanese: エキス・パーツ Ekisu pātsu) is one of Doraemon's gadgets that first appeared in the anime episode I Humbly Accept Your Good Points.
This gadget extracts the essence of someone's body and lets other people have it for a period of time.
appears_in: I Humbly Accept Your Good Points

jp_name: 進化退化ビーム Shinka Taika Bīmu
description: This gadget is used to evolve or devolve/degenerate anything whether living or inanimate objects.
appears_in: A Visitor from the Country of the Future/U.S. English dub

jp_name: ばくはつコショウ Baku hatsu koshō
description: When the user uses this pepper and sprinkles at other people's nose, then those people will sneeze (within powerful energy). That energy causes the user to fly but, remember, when people are preparing to sneeze the user must say out the place where the user wants to go, if not the user will fly in the sky non-stop. There is a problem with this gadget, if the people who had been sprinkled by the user covers his/her mouth when he/she sneezes, the power from his/her sneeze will be less and the user can only fly for a short distance.

jp_name: らくがおペン Rakugao pen
description: The user draws over one's face on a picture via Face-Doodling Pen, and so that person's face will look exactly like it does in the photo which is doodled over by the Face-Doodling Pen. It is impossible to make the user look back normally without the usage of the Cancellation Eraser.

jp_name: 流行性ネコシャクシウイルス or 流行性ネコシャクシビールス
description:
When a few drops of Fashion Virus is put into a petri dish, the 'experimenter' can say whatever things they want to add to the present fashion an alter it in a similar way of 'invocation'. The virus will then multiply and become abundant inside the petri dish. Afterwards, spreading the virus in the air will then make the virus spread and 'infects' any of the 'victims'. After the victim has been infested, they will immediately rush to change into the new "infectious" line of fashion.
The Fashion Virus is originally used for experimentation. Since fashion always changes from about the longest of between 10 years and the shortest of between 7 months, using it helps in research of trending and grossing ideas.

eng_name: Fishing Pond for Things You Dropped
jp_name: 落とし物つりぼり Ōtoshimono tsuribori
description: The pond is used for looking for things that people have dropped i.e. lost. A fishing pole is dipped in the pond a description of the lost object is given. The user then has to specify the area of where to look, and the pole will most possibly drag out the object from the pond, or at least what it thinks is the object.
appears_in: The Fishing Pond for Things You Dropped

jp_name: 虫スカン
description:
The Flashbang is one of Doraemon's gadgets.
The Flashbang causes a loud yet harmless explosion and a gust of smoke upon detonation.
appears_in: Nobita and the Knights of Dinosaurs

jp_name: General InformationFunctionsDetailsGeneral InformationFunctionsDetails
description:
A roller variant called the Flattening Roller is used in the 2005 anime which has the same properties as the Flattening Iron.
Use this gadget against any object (also works on people) and it will turn the object into a paper-like thinness. Since it weighs just like paper, the user can easily carry it around. It will return to normal when sprayed with water.
This gadget is used by Doraemon and Nobita to effortlessly move the furniture in Gian's cousin's apartment.

jp_name: おせじ口べに
description: The Flattering Lipstick has two sides. One side is the Flattering Lipstick itself, while the other is the Insulting Lipstick. Applying them on one's lips will make all their words either 'flattering' or 'insulting', depending on what type of lipstick used. Simply wiping them off from the lips will remove its effect.

jp_name: おだてヅヨ一ズ
description:
If someone wears the Flattery Jaws, they will be able to be very good at flattering someone.
<tabber>
|-|2005 anime=

jp_name: フワフワオビ
description: The Floating Scarf must be worn properly so that it may carry the wearer likewise. The typical method of wearing it by wrapping it around the shoulders and arm. The Floating Scarf will then make its wearer float, just like the goddess in the popular Noh play, Hagoromo. The Floating Scarf is incredibly light, so its flight pattern may be greatly affected by wind patterns. Unlike the Take-copter, the Floating Scarf doesn't consume battery.

jp_name: 飛ばし穴 Tobashi ana
description: It can skip the person or animal who set foot on it. In the manga, it became invisible when placed on the ground.

jp_name: ワスレンボー Wasurenbō
description: When the gadget hits the head of a person that person's memories will be forgotten. When hit again, the memories will return but his/her memories before he/she was hit again will be removed.
appears_in: Nobita and the Island of Miracles ~Animal Adventure~

jp_name: 四次元たてましブロック
description:
By inserting a "room block" between the first floor and the top floor, a new room will be created between the two floors. When looking from the outside the exterior of the house will be the same as the rooms are compressed in the 4th dimension.
The 2005 version of the anime also reveals that if the block is somehow removed while there is still a person inside the room, when exiting the room and attempting to go up or down the stairs, the person will be trapped on the same floor like Möbius strip.

jp_name: フリーサイズぬいぐるみカメラ Furī Saizu Nuigurumi Kamera
description:
The item can accept when fed with an image of a specified target - usually a humanoid entity - as ammunition. Afterwards, it spews a spheric capsule that expands into a plush suit resembling the target.
The plush adapts to the user actively so they can be used by shorter or taller entities. It visually resembles the target in many ways, but cannot fully disguise the voice of the user as it is still somewhat different to the original counterpart.

jp_name: 友だちの輪 Tomodachi no Wa
description: By standing inside the circle with a partner it can make them befriend each other.

jp_name: ケガワリング Kegawaringu
description: When the body passes through this hoop, it will be coated with fur. The effect of Fur Coat Ring does not wear off until three days. The fur can be shaved, but it grows back after some time.

jp_name: 天才ヘルメット Tensai Herumetto
description:
When the user wears this gadget, the user can see the structure of a machine well by seeing through the cover. The gadget is used for repairing things and remodeling machines. But this gadget is no use at all if it is not paired up with Technology Gloves as only the gloves can remodel the things.
It looks like a welding helmet with a large dark window that shows the user the machines' structure. The rest is in yellow color.

jp_name: ガルフレンド カタログ
description:
The Girlfriend Catalog is a gadget that has appeared in the manga and 1979 anime. Doraemon gave it to Nobita after becoming curious of how many girls he would date in his later life and if he would be married to Shizuka. 
The Girlfriend Catalog spawns out multiple images of future girlfriends one may have in the future.

jp_name: ゴーゴー ドッグ Gō Gō Doggu
description: This gadget prevents the target from going to a person's house. The Go Go Dog is useful to repel intruders and catrobbers. Its function is the opposite of the Come Come Cat.

jp_name: ゴーホーム.オルゴール Gōhōmuorugōru
description: Play the music and the one who listened to the music will be forced to go home.
appears_in: Nobita's Great Battle of the Mermaid King

jp_name: ふきとばし・せん風機 Fukitobashi Sen-fū-ki
description: Only push the button, you can blow anything including heavy objects and even buildings.

jp_name: ごきげんポカポカシール Goki Gen Pokapokashīru
description: Just put this sticker on the body. It'll be able to convert emotional energy into heat. If we become really cheerful, it'll raise our body temperature and make us feel warm and cozy. Otherwise, if our mood took a nose dive, the temperature dropped as well.

jp_name: いいとこ選択しボード Ītoko Sentakushi Bōdo
description:
It is white at the bottom and light purple at the top. It has a big yellow button at the bottom and the Power bar is red in color, the Looks bar is green and the IQ or Intelligence bar is blue. They also have pictorial representations of Power, Looks and Intelligence at the top (above the bars).
The user can increase or decrease his/her own looks (L), power (P) and intelligence (IQ) using this gadget by raising the bar of the specific quality. However, they cannot increase all three at the same time. If one goes up, the other two partially go down.
The Power button is also known as the Strength button.

jp_name: グルメテーブルかけ Gurumetēburu Kake
description:
The Gourmet Table Cloth is a very complicated gadget that is able to 'manifest' real food as if it is conjured up from thin air. The user(s) may simply use the cloth by voice command. For example, if Gian says "Katsudon!" towards the cloth, then a katsudon will appear in smokes on the cloth. Throughout the series, it has been very convenient for the gang especially when they are having a picnic or camping out.
Kurt Hartman made his own version of the Gourmet Table Cloth, the "B-Class Gourmet Table Cloth". Its function is similar to the Gourmet Table Cloth, although due to his inventions mostly hardly considered 'fully effective' or 'decent', it did manifest a pineapple hamburger for Suneo, but it manifested living chickens, a cow as well as a tomato and onion.
appears_in: Mushroom Picking with a Mini Garden
Nobita and the Birth of Japan 2016

jp_name: 重力ペンキ Jūryoku Penki
description:
When painted on a material, particularly a wall, a person who steps or walks on the material will not fall because the portion painted portion is not affected by gravity. The paint takes roughly 2 minutes to dry completely on its own.
Apparently, the paint's gravitational effects only takes place when it has already dried when painted.
appears_in: Nobita and the Haunts of Evil
The New Nobita's Great Demon ~Peko and the Exploration Party of 5~
Doraemon: New Nobita's Great Demon ~Peko and the Exploration Party of 5~

jp_name: 番犬貯金箱 Banken Chokin-bako
description: The gadget looks like a small brown dog having a slot at the place of it's eyes. It wears blue belt around it's neck having yellow spikes on it. Four of it's teeth are visible even when it's mouth is closed.

jp_name: ガードロボット Gādorobotto
description: It acts as a bodyguard shooting laser beams to those who come nearby other than the person targeted to protect. However, it is unable to protect the person from aliens as the aliens were getting closer to Shizuka and when it tried to scare them away, the aliens were able to fight back.

jp_name: まもり紙 Mamorigami
description:
You must attract the paper's attention by clapping your hands (like the Shinto people praying) three times. The paper will guard you.
The opposite gadget is Pestilence Paper.

jp_name: ミチビキエンゼル
description:
In the Japanese episodes, this gadget is voiced by Keiko Yokozawa and Mayumi Tanaka in the 1979 series and Yoshiko Kamei in the 2005 series. It was voiced by Wendee Lee in the English dub of the 2005 series.
The Guidance Angel offers guidance to their wearer. They always tell them the best thing to do, with the doll itself have the power to predict the future. Although its guidance always saves the wearer from danger or trouble, the doll can be a 'control freak'. For example, the good guidance it can give is when how to swing or to let the ball pass when Nobita is playing baseball. The other example is the bad guidance that tells Nobita to study instead of helping Doraemon find his lost screw.
The Guidance Angel is a good consultant, but it is a control freak. Because it can predict the future, it is often very snobbish about its knowledge. Its opinions are very selfish, only cares about the person's well being (in terms of success in life) instead of their morality.
The Guidance Angel is one of the "Aids (たすける) Gadgets" in the game. It cost only 1 Bell Point, the cheapest to use amongst the other. It shows the proper path for the player by pointing out the way. When an item is spotted, it will fly towards it, prompting the player to pick them up. If the player is ignoring it and/or going the other way around, the Guidance Angel will start hitting either Doraemon or Nobita angrily. Note that it does not deal damage to either Nobita or Doraemon.
Unlike in the series, the Guidance Angel in this game flies around, and only actives for a while.
The Guidance Angel is listed under number 55 out of 61 gadgets in the game.

jp_name: みちび機
description: When the button is pressed, a fortune comes out to tell one what they should do. By following the fortune precisely, the best outcome will come forth toward the user.

jp_name: ガリバー光線電灯
description: The Gulliver Beam Light has the same functions as both the Big Light and Small Light. It has two buttons: one is red and the other is blue. By pressing the red button it can enlarge humans and/or objects and the blue does the opposite, it shrinks things.
appears_in: Rats Are As Weak As Cats
Rats Are As Weak As Cats

jp_name: ガリバートンネル
description: To become small, the user must go through the tunnel, they will remain small until they go through the tunnel again to become big. However, if the user is going through the big entrance of the tunnel, they will become smaller and possibly be blown by the wind, as Doraemon stated.

jp_name: 手作り雲セット Tedzukuri kumo setto
description:
Handmade Cloud Set is one of gadget owned by Doraemon. This gadget package contain cloud seed, cloud maker machine, and cloud frame wire.
First, you have to make any shape you want with a cloud frame wire. Then, fill the cloud machine with cloud seed. The clouds will come out from the machine. After that, stick to the cloud frames you have been made until the entire surface is covered by the clouds. Your handmade cloud is ready. have fun!

jp_name: しあわせトランプ
description: It has 53 cards. Any wish of the user will come true while holding it. However, after using 52 cards leaving the joker everything will go wrong with the holder. In brief, the user will get several bad things instead. Giving it to someone can get rid of them, but if the user throws away it will come flying back to him/her.

jp_name: ハッピープロムナード Happī Puromunādo
description:
Happy Promenade (ハッピープロムナード Happī Puromunādo) is a gadget owned by Doraemon.
It resembles a mat, and it has two pathes on it with some tree's decoration. If you walking from blue to yellow path, your feelings will be more happy and cheerful. But if you walking from opposite path (yellow to blue path), your feeling will more sad, despair and horrible.
appears_in: Let's Walk Our Way to Happiness!

jp_name: ゴルゴンの首 Gorugon no Kubi
description:
When the box is opened, the user will slowly turn into stone. But if the user pulls the snake on top of the box, the user will turn back to normal. In truth, it is actually a stone-made head with a terrifying design that can emit a type of light from its eyes to turn their target to stone. Pulling the snake which is its hair returns the petrified to normal.
In the 2013 movie, it introduces the DX version of it which is very large in size and can levitate above the ground. Unlike the one introduced in the manga and anime, that version's resetting effect only seems to work if the user yanks one of the snakes while it is facing the petrified subject. The gang defeated it with Shizuka taking over and using a mirror to reflect its petrifying rays back to it. Apparently, the snakes are invulnerable from turning to stone by the rays.

jp_name: タスケテ帽 Tasukete Bō
description:
The Helping Hat has an antennae that detects the nearest person in trouble and guides its user to them. It seems to have a set range.
The Helping Hat is Shizuka's second gadget as an Assist Character. When used, Shizuka assumes her 'Magical Girl Shizuru' persona, flying around Doraemon and Nobita occasionally attacking enemies with her syringe that turns them instantaneously into either Hearts(for current health), or Dorayaki(extra life). If the current character(either Doraemon or Nobita) fell down into a pit, Shizuka will save them by bringing them up. The player may control Shizuka carrying the current character for a few seconds, that is, until she lets go and she returns to the Secret Base screen. When saving the current character, Nobita or Doraemon is completely invulnerable.
When using this gadget, Shizuka cannot be dispatched via traps or pits because she is flying and virtually invulnerable. Practically, Shizuka used all three gadgets in the episode, the Inanimate Object Hypnotizing Megaphone, the Dress Up Camera and the Helping Hat itself.
The Helping Hat is listed under number 33 out of 61 gadgets in the game.
appears_in: Thank God for the Prison Break

jp_name: 家庭科エプロソ
description: The gadget is nothing more than a normal apron in most physical properties, other than its titular enhancement - namely a significant boost to the user's household work proficiency. The item can also be disabled by mechanical faults and is prone to weathering.

jp_name: 地平線テープ Chiheisen Tēpu
description:
It can be used to create an endless huge area that clearly shows the land meeting the sky i.e. the horizon. First, the user sticks one end of the tape to one side of the room and the other end to the other side. The stretched tape must now be facing a wall, and instead of the wall a large area of ground will appear where the horizon can be clearly seen. 
Warning. if you break this tape inside the horizon area. you will be trapped in the horizon area forever!.
appears_in: Doraemon: Nobita's Chronicle of the Moon Exploration

jp_name: 怪談ランプ Kaidan Ranpu
description: Horror Story Lamp creates the surrounding scenery with various sound effects and even environmental changes like a shifting wind of sudden blow-out of the candle. For example, Nobita tells the story similar to Gian's (the Okiku's Plate,番町皿屋敷, lit. The Dish Mansion at Banchō), they heard a sound of a broken plate outside of the room. The cause of that sound was later revealed to be caused by a thief, whom was also counting the money he looted, similar to the scene when the ghost of Okiku was counting (plates).

jp_name: 人間製造機 Ningen seizō ki
description:
Human Manufacturing Machine is a gadget owned by Doraemon. It is one of the banned gadgets.
It can create humans (manga & 1979 anime) and other creatures (2005 anime). But the creatures made with it are mutants.

jp_name: 人間貯金箱製造機 Ningen chokin-bako seizō ki
description: This gadget is used to make a piggy bank from a human. Just enter the code into the gadget and navigate it to the target.

jp_name: 人間機関草 Ningen Kikan-sō
description: The user places a smokestack on their head and uses coal-shaped candy after that drinking enough water to gain the speed and torque of a steam train.

jp_name: さいみん貯金箱 Saimin Chokin-bako
description: This gadget is like a piggy bank whose shape looks like a gas cylinder having a popped out flexible and stretchable hand at the top of it. The body of this gadget is metallic and is maroon in color. It consists of an eye having greenish pupil and a slot. The popped out hand has a glove on it.

jp_name: General InformationFunctionsDetails
description: With this tool, the user can put people (even robots) into hypnosis.

jp_name: イルミネーション クラッカー Iruminēshon Kurakkā
description: If someone takes this cracker, the person will glow. And once the user starts glowing, they stay lit up for the entire day.

jp_name: イメージライトキャップ Imēji Raito Kyappu
description: If someone puts the cap on and points it at an incident that is happening at the moment, whatever is happening will change and instead turn into what the user thinks will happen, not what actually would have happened.
appears_in: Suneo is the Ideal Big Brother

jp_name: 人真似ロボット Hitomane Robotto
description: The Imitation Dummy may copy a person's appearance and other aspects on command. It may function as a substitute for that person. Its method of imitation is similar to mimicry, as they tend to be more exaggerated.

jp_name: なげ投げ縄 Nage Nage Nawa
description:
The Infinity Lasso is one of Doraemon's gadgets.
Throw the lasso and it will catch whatever the user wants, the lasso can even make a turn if needed.
appears_in: A Visitor from the Country of the Future/U.S. English dub
Running Away to the Cretaceous Period

jp_name: コンチュー丹 Konchū Tan
description:
It gives the user the power to fly like a butterfly, the power to sting like bees, ants' strength, and a strong body, such as in a hard beetle. It also causes the user to have bug-like behaviors like eating leaves, being afraid of nets and fainting due to bug sprays.
Nobita

jp_name: インスタントチョコメーカー Insutanto Choko Mēkā
description: When an object is placed on the gadget, the gadget produces a chocolate with the shape of the certain object. The chocolate produced by the gadget is delicious.

jp_name: インスタントコピー機 Insutantokopī-ki
description: The sole function of the Instant Copy Machine is to copy another person. Unlike the Copy Robot, it can make multiple copies of one person.

jp_name: インスタントミニチュアサいぞうカメラInsutantominichuasa i zō kamera
description: Snap a picture with this camera, and it will instantly develop a miniature model that looks exactly like what you took a picture of. (Note: This gadget is also as seen in Doraemon & Tamagotchi!)
appears_in: The City of Dreams, Nobita Land

jp_name: 物体瞬間移動機
description: The gadget is a machine that has a screen with a pointer, which serves to indicate what object or person the user wants to bring. It also has a platform where the determined object or person will appear when the user presses and "O.K." button. In both of its appearances, it was used to bring back the toys and manga that Gian had confiscated.

jp_name: 即席落とし穴 Sokuseki Otoshiana
description: It is used to create a pitfall, which is basically something like a hole in the ground used for hiding. In the movie Nobita and the Steel Troops, it is used by Doraemon, Nobita, Gian and Suneo to protect themselves from the Steel Troops.
appears_in: Nobita and the Island of Miracles ~Animal Adventure~

jp_name: インスタントツリー, Insutanto Tsurī
description:
The Instant Tree is used for Christmas and can replace a typical Christmas tree. In order to make it function, one must pour hot water on the soil, and it will then start to grow into a Christmas tree.
<tabber>
|-|2005 anime=

jp_name: 透明マント Tōmei Manto
description: Use the cape and cover something and the thing, along with the cape itself, will turn invisible.
appears_in: A Visitor from the Country of the Future
Battle! Cat-Model Robots VS Dog-Model Robots
Shoes to Dance According to the Type of Music
Who is the Mask of Academic?

jp_name: ジャック豆 Jakkumame
description: It acts like the bean in the traditional fairytale Jack and the Beanstalk.

jp_name: びっくり箱ステッキ Bikkuribako Sutekki
description: Any type of boxes or containers touched by the Stick will become a Jack-in-the-Box containing scary monsters
appears_in: The Jack in the Box Stick

jp_name: 温泉ジャグジー Onsen Jagujī
description: The gadget can be attached to a bath tub. It is normally used to create Jacuzzis, but with Nobita's experiment, it can also produce a "food" Jacuzzi.
appears_in: Let's Take a Bath in a Delicious Hot Spring!

jp_name: 日本標準カレンダー Nippon Hyōjun Karendā
description: One should use the red sticker and paste it on the day the user wants to have the holiday. Then, write down what the holiday is called and the entire Japanese calendar will be changed to match that of the gadget. The entirety of Japan will then follow the new national day(s) on their calendars. For example, Nobita wrote "Nap Day" and all the people in Japan took a nap. One can revert its effect by taking off the sticker.

jp_name: なかまいりせんこう  naka mairi senkō
description: By pressing the button, a smoke will come out of the green tip. Walk around the target person/people with the smoke surrounding them at least once and you will be able to join their group.

jp_name: 怪盗セット Kaitō Setto
description: The Kaito Set is technically multiple gadgets, each of which do a unique function.

jp_name: 怪盗デラックス
description:
The Kaitou DX is a gadget that appears in Doraemon: Nobita's Secret Gadget Museum.
A user who puts on the bow tie can have the abilities of a Phantom Thief, who were gentlemen/ladies who steals expensive things not for wealth but for adventure.

jp_name: 王様の椅子 Ōsama no isu
description: This gadget is used to make everyone completely unable to ignore the commands of the person sitting in it until they are carried out.

jp_name: クルクルパー光線 Kurukurupā Kōsen
description: The Kurupa Rays Gun is a gun-shaped gadget that serves to hypnotise or weaken the human brain, and thus making the person act more dumb. The gadget launches radio waves. It was used by Doraemon, who made Nobita's classmates and teacher unintelligent and his parents more childish.

jp_name: おそだアメ Osoda Ame
description:
When consumed, the user's voice will be delayed for a period of time, based on the amount of candy ate
Each candy can delay the user's voice for 10 minutes.

jp_name: ゲラゲライヤホン
description: If a person puts it in their ear, everything they hear turns into a joke that is very funny.

jp_name: タヌ機, Tanuki
description: This gadget is used to control the mind like the mythological creatures of Japanese (Tanuki).

jp_name: ＬＩＥ　８００
description:
When consumed, any events said by the user will forcibly occur in the other way around.
It is able to affect subjects any point in the timeline. For example, when Suneo insults Nobita who curses him with the potion's effects, a dog suddenly appears out of nowhere and viciously attacks Suneo, and when Nobita laments on Doraemon's premature departure, the latter suddenly pops out inside his room.

jp_name: アトカラホントスピーカー Atokarahonto supīkā
description: Hold this bullhorn up to your mouth and tell a lie, and that lie will then become truth.

jp_name: 助け船 Tasukebune
description: It is used to detect and find people who need help.

jp_name: ふんわりズッシリメーター
description: This meter can be used to modify the weight of a person or object. Point the meter towards the thing you want to use it on, and press the one of the buttons on either side. If you want to make it heavier, push the + button, if you want to make it lighter, push the negative (-) button.

jp_name: 幸運の銃 Kōun no jū
description: There are four bullets, three of them are red and one black. Get hit by the red bullet, and one will have a day of good luck. Get hit by the black bullet, and one will have a day of bad luck.

jp_name: ソノウソホント Sonousohonto
description:
Wearing this on one's mouth and lying to someone makes them believe that the spoken lie is true, even though it is actually not. To stop the effect of the gadget, the wearer has to conclude that it is a lie.

</gallery>

jp_name: 横たわる機械 Yokotawaru kikai
description: When the user tells a lie (or joke) to the person, that person will believe whatever that user has told him/her, regardless of how ridiculous or unbelievable it was.

jp_name: マジックおなか
description:
Magic Belly is a gadget used in the episode, Cartoonist Jaiko.
This gadget can be used with two users. First, one of the users places the red "belly button" on another user. With a simple swipe of the console, he or she can make the other laugh uncontrollably. The harder the swipe and the more the swipe, the harder the laugh and the more the laugh.
For the 1979 anime entitled The Magic Belly, a cat used the console and made Suneo laugh, whereas Shizuka does so in the 2005 anime entitled Cartoonist Jaiko.

jp_name: マジックお尻 Majikku o shiri
description:
When a parent spanks this gadget, they can administer punishment, no matter where their child is. this is similar to voodoo doll
It is more commonly used by Nobita's father,  as a way to punish him and also take some satisfaction.
The gadget also helps in stopping hiccups, as seen in Doraemon Is An Exam Student Now!?
appears_in: Doing Anything I Please with the Magic Hand
Doraemon Is An Exam Student Now!?

jp_name: 百万ボルトひとみ Hyakuman boruto hitomi
description:
Hyakuman boruto hitomiTo use the gadget, the user places the eyes on a gadget and wears it. The gadget then created an attraction electric wave that causes anyone who look at the user in the eyes to become attracted to them. As such, the effect doesn't manifest if other person doesn't look in the eyes, and the attraction will subside in a few seconds after the person stops looking/is separated from the user or the user takes the glasses off.
Beware, if the user looks at themselve in the mirror, then the user will become attracted to their own reflection.
appears_in: Your Eyes Have One million Volts

jp_name: マジックハンド Majikku Hando
description: Whenever the user wears the Magic Hands, they can gain slight telekinetic or mind control powers, acting on objects and other living beings without touching them.
appears_in: Doing Anything I Please with the Magic Hands

jp_name: マリオの土管 Mario no Dokan
description:
Japanese Prime Minister, Shinzō Abe, is not able to make it in time to the closing ceremony of the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio. He transforms into Mario, a character from Super Mario Bros. and is seen running across Tokyo's Shibuya Crossing a moment later. Doraemon, a blue cat-shaped robot who appears in the titular anime and manga, happens to be in the vicinity and takes out the Warp Pipe, which allows Mario to be transported to Rio, which is halfway across the world.
The warp pipe drills a hole into the core of the Earth from the current area the user is in to the designated area.Its' use is to transport someone to a designated place or area anywhere through the earth. The pipe drills a hole to the core and then to the designated area the user wants to go to. Just like in the Mario series, pipes take a very short time to anywhere regardless of distance.

jp_name: メカ・メーカー
description:
The Mecha Maker is a gadget from the 2005 anime.
Mecha Maker allows the user to create mechanical contraptions. A blueprint and materials must be inserted for it to work.
This was an episode from the Doraemon English Dub that premiered on Disney XD.

jp_name: メモリーローン Memorīrōn
description:
This is a gadget that allow the user to exchange their memories for money, as well as for erasing any unwanted memories by paying money in exchange. The user first places the tube section on their forehead for the gadget to scan their memory. Afterwards, the machine displays all the memories/events the user experienced along with the exchange price, with exchange rate varying from person to person depending on what they believe to be good or bad memory. The user then selects which memory to exchange for money, with good memories resulting in payout, while bad memories has the user pay money instead.
After the transaction, the memory is removed from the user's brain. The removed memory can be returned by repeating the process in opposite i.e. pay money to return good memories, receive money for returning bad memories.

jp_name: さとりヘルメット
description: Doraemon brings out this gadget to help Nobita who was tricked by Gian.

jp_name: ミニブラックホール Miniburakkuhōru
description:
This gadget is basically the miniature version of a big bad black hole which usually stay in space. Black holes are such things that even don't let light escape from itself so this gadget has to be handled very carefully! One mistake and slowly you, your house, your city, country, continent and then the entire planet gets sucked in! This gadget is just as scary as a real black hole...
If you drink a medicine that breaks the effects of this gadget, the sucked objects however will reappeared in the supposed place that your...

jp_name: 箱庭シリーズ・急流山 Hakoniwa Shirīzu: Kyūryūzan箱庭シリーズ・赤松山 Hakoniwa Shirīzu: Akamatsuyama箱庭シリーズ・岩山 Hakoniwa Shirīzu: Iwayama箱庭シリーズ・ゲレンデ山 Hakoniwa Shirīzu: Gerendeyama箱庭シリーズ・ハイキング山 Hakoniwa Shirīzu: Haikinguyama箱庭シリーズ・冒険山 Hakoniwa Shirīzu: Bōkenyama
description:
Mini Garden Series (箱庭シリーズ Hakoniwa Shirīzu) is the series of Doraemon's gadget. These gadgets is useless if the user hasn't Small Light.

Main article: White Water Mountain
The White Water Mountain is the suitable mountain for fishing.

The Japanese Red Pine Mountain is the suitable mountain for mushroom picking.

Main article: Rocky Mountain
The Rocky Mountain is the suitable mountain for practicing rock climbing.

Main article: Snowy Mountain
The Snowy Mountain is the suitable mountain for skiing.

Main article: Hiking Mountain
The Hiking Mountain is the  mountain for kids. This mountain can use for hiking and picnic.

Main article: Adventurous Mountain
The Adventurous Mountain is the  mountain for adventure.
appears_in: Mushroom Picking with a Mini Garden

jp_name: ミニドラ MinidoraGeneral informationCasual informationRelationshipsOther DetailsGallery
description:
Mini-Doras are one of Doraemon's gadgets. 
Mini-Doras were robots created by the Matsushiba Robot Factory per Time Patrol's request to celebrate Doraemon's heroism in helping them to arrest two terrorists.

Being smaller clones of Doraemon with different paint jobs, they are sentiment automatons that act as tiny helpers, capable of performing wide variety of tasks while communicating with the "Minidora" language. They appear to be capable of understanding other types of human languages.
They also have the ability to use gadgets, albeit to a lesser extent due to their size. However, they are not as effective as Doraemon himself or other similar machines such as Dorami.
Like Doraemon himself, they are agitated if referred to with the alias "raccoon".
appears_in: Doraemon: Nobita and the Green Giant Legend DS

jp_name: たずね人(びと)ステッキ Tazunebitosutekki
description: It use indicate the the direction of a person you want to find. However, if the person you want to find is from another timeline, it will cause confusion.
appears_in: 45 Years Later... My Future Self Came to Visit/2005 Anime
Running Away to the Cretaceous Period
Nobita and the Birth of Japan 2016

jp_name: もぐら手袋 Mogura tebukuro
description:
The gloves are mostly in color with the mix of green on the sharp parts. It looks very easy to wear and is large and can fit anyone's hands easily. 
This gadget used to make hole in the ground or create underpass. This gadget can dig the deepest holes and cut through the ground like butter.
appears_in: Nobita's New Great Adventure into the Underworld – The Seven Magic Users

jp_name: 桃太郎印のきびだんごMomotarō Jirushi no Kibidango
description: It was used to tame a beast. Once it got rotten, it will lose its effect.
appears_in: Nobita and the Haunts of Evil
The New Nobita's Great Demon ~Peko and the Exploration Party of 5~
Nobita and the Island of Miracles ~Animal Adventure~
Doraemon: New Nobita's Great Demon ~Peko and the Exploration Party of 5~

jp_name: ムードもりあげ楽団
description: By playing their instrument, they can change one's mood.
appears_in: The Debut of the Mood-Changing Orchestra!
Doraemon: Nobita in the Robot Kingdom

jp_name: モーゼステッキ Mōzesutekki
description:
It looks like a stick of an old man and is brown in color. It has some buttons on it too. It is also a very long stick. 
It can split the water into two even seas. If the gadget turned off or out of baterry, the water returns to the original.

eng_name: Mother Robot: The Substitute Mother Egg
jp_name: ハハオヤロボット:  オフクローのたまごHahaoyarobotto: Ofukurō no tama go
description:
Hahaoyarobotto: Ofukurō no tama goSubstitute Mother Egg (オフクローのたまご) is a Doraemon's gadget.
Upon activation, it shatters and generates a prosthetic, anthropomorphic mechanical female owl after several seconds. Once the owl hatches, she recognizes the first living thing as her target and become a caretaker for the subject. She functions for 8 hours, after which she returns to her dormant state in the shell

jp_name: エヌ・エス ワッペン
description:
The N (North) badge is red in color and the S (South) badge in blue in color, representing the two different colors of a magnet. 
When two persons wears the same Crest (either N or S), they will repel each other, just like how magnets works. While if one person wears the N Crest while the other wears the S Crest, they'll be attracted to each other. Simply put, the Crest itself cause the person to become a magnetic pole themselves (theoretically speaking).
appears_in: Nobita and the New Steel Troops ~Angel Wings~

jp_name: 自然観察プラモシリーズナンバーワン "Shizen kansatsu puramoshirīzu nanbā wan"停止液
description:
The Nature Plastic Model Series (Nature Observation Plastic Model Series) are a series of gadgets that are used for natural observations. Animals that can lay eggs, such as birds and fish, are the types of plastic models available. Four such plastic models are featured in the episode of the same name.
Each plastic model comes with a pedestal and two halves of an egg shell. One has to set up the pedestal and place the egg shell on the pedestal for the growth process to occur. Once the plastic model reaches its end of the growth process, it disappears back to the two halves of the egg shell.
Alternatively, the user can choose to let the plastic model remain at any stage of the growth process by using a Stop Spray on the plastic model. This way, the plastic model will not disappear into the half-eggs and remain at that stage.

jp_name: ネコジャラ林 Nekojararin
description: By waving this bell you can attract all the cats around you.

jp_name: ネンドロン, Nendoron
description: With this gadget you can deform anything.
appears_in: Doraemon: Nobita Drifts in the Universe

jp_name: 夜ランプ Yoruranpu
description: The function is very simple, This night lamp can change a bright side into dark side by installing it. In the end of episode "I Will sell the night" Doraemon has a day lamp it can change a dark side into a bright side.

jp_name: はなバルーン Hana barūn
description: Turn the dial to select the desired color, insert the tip into your nose and blow in, then breathe in your nose, and you will make a balloon of the selected color from your nostrils.

jp_name: General InformationFunctionsDetails
description:
The gadget is shaped like a horsetail. There is a red button which when pressed, emits a light that makes anyone the user's servant.
When the user presses the red button, the person(s) who is exposed to the light will want to serve the user no matter what.
appears_in: I'll Use the Nurse-to-Death Stick on You

jp_name: 取り寄せバッグ (とりよせバッグ) Toriyose Baggu
description:
Doraemon trying to get Shizuka from the bag.Think of a item and the user will be able to get it from the purse such as the Anywhere Door and food.
The items pulled out from it can 'distort' similar to how Doraemon pull out most large gadget from the 3D Pocket. Thus, it may be used to take a plethora of item with wide range of sizes.
However, is something doesn't exist or not allowed to get, the gadget electrifies the user. In a episode, Doraemon tries to get Shizuka through the bag but fails because Shizuka is taking a bath at that time.
appears_in: Doraemon: Nobita and the Castle of the Undersea Devil
Nobita and the Fantastic Three Musketeers
I've Got a Spare Fourth Dimensional Pocket
Doraemon: Nobita's Great Adventure in the Antarctic Kachi Kochi
Doraemon Is An Exam Student Now!?

jp_name: 人さがしかさ Hitosagashi Kasa祝傘 Iwai Kasa愛傘 Ai Kasaマラソン傘 Marason Kasaお化け傘 Obake Kasaコウモリ傘 Kōmori Kasa嵐傘 Arashi Kasaあいあいパラソル Aiai Parasoru
description:
The Odd Umbrellas (おかしな傘 Okasina Kasa) is a set of gadget umbrellas belonging to Doraemon.


Nobisuke called to tell Tamako that Nobita is not at the train station, so she sends Doraemon to look for Nobita. He takes out the umbrella, which tells him where Nobita is by pointing to his direction. Nobita and Doraemon continue to use it during the rain.


When opened, the umbrella acts as a party popper which fully covers the user in streamers.


The Rotation Umbrella is an umbrella used for babies.
When opened, baby objects come out of the umbrella and rotates in a clockwise direction. Several commuters coming in and out of the train station can be seen to admire Nobisuke's umbrella when he uses it in the 2005 anime.


The Muscle Umbrella is an umbrella used to train the body to have strong muscles.
Due to its heavy weight, Nobisuke struggles and ends up injured using it.


The Love Umbrella (愛傘 Ai Kasa) is an umbrella introduced in the 2005 anime used to create holograms of ideal girlfriends.
For a start, the umbrella creates a hologram when opened. The umbrella has a turning button that creates new holograms that surround him, so the user could have as many ideal girlfriends as he wish. Nobita creates six of them, and caused Shizuka, who is on her way to violin class, to have a mistaken impression.


The Marathon Umbrella (マラソン傘 Marason Kasa) is an umbrella used to run a marathon.
It is introduced only in the 2005 anime; when held, it sends the user running without stopping, and the user would not feel tired at all. Currently, it could only be stopped when the user lets it go.


The Ghost Umbrella (お化け傘 Obake Kasa) is an umbrella introduced in the 2005 anime used to summon ghost (monsters).
Gian demands Doraemon to take out a similar umbrella Nobisuke is using. He takes this out, and to Gian's horror, monsters appear when it is opened, sending him running away.


The Bat Umbrella (コウモリ傘 Kōmori Kasa) is an umbrella used to fly.
This umbrella takes the user to where he wishes to go. In the 1979 anime, Nobisuke used at the train station, whereas in the 2005 anime, he used it after he used the Marathon Umbrella. Sending him flying, he ends up on top of a tree and loses the umbrella.


The Parachute Umbrella is an umbrella that is similar to a parachute. It can land someone, who is trapped in the air, back to safety.


The Storm Umbrella (嵐傘 Arashi Kasa) is an umbrella used to create a thunderstorm. It has no protection against the rain, and leaves the user exposed to it.
Due to its resemblance with Nobita's umbrella, Doraemon ends up lending Nobisuke the Storm Umbrella by accident. Annoyed, Nobisuke chases after Nobita and Doraemon.

Main article: Emotional Umbrella
The Emotional Umbrella (あいあいパラソル Aiai Parasoru) is a umbrella used to make person in the right side of umbrella will fall in love on the person in the left side.

jp_name: 鬼は外ビーンス
description: The beans are used to transfer things and people (usually undesired) from one place to another. For example, if someone puts a rubber into a bottle, the user can’t the rubber out. An "Out With The Demons" bean, however, can be used to extract the rubber from the bottle. Simply saying "Out with the Demons!" whilst throwing the bean at the target will have the object or person moved to another location (in this case, the rubber would end up immediately outside the bottle).
appears_in: Nobita's Great Adventure into the Underworld

jp_name: 海外リョコッキ "Kaigai Ryokokki"
description: With this gadget, you can feel what it's like to go to that country in your area. Equipped with a expert world tour guide, it will ready to guide you to go to a country you choose it. If you want to raise the taste, people around you will start talking language according to the country you choose, and the area around you will turn into that country place. The effect canceled if you remove this gadget.

jp_name: 通り抜けフープ Tōrinuke Fūpu
description:
The Pass Loop can be placed on a wall and it will function akin to a miniature portal.
Portable Holes
appears_in: Gian Makes an Appearance on TV
