jp_name: ミチサキステッキ
description:
When confused in the cross section, erect the stick and follow whichever side it falls on.
The Path-Finding Stick problem is that it can’t detect dangerous things like a bomb.
appears_in: Move Fast, Doraemon! The Galactic Grandprix
Nobita and the Birth of Japan
Nobita and the Birth of Japan

jp_name: しんじゅ製造アコヤケース Shinju Seizō Akoya Kēsu
description:
It used to produce pearl when placed in the water.
Shinju seizō akoyakēsu made up of word Shinju (Pearl), Seizō (Production), Akoya (meaning Akoya pearl oyster), and Kēsu (Case).

jp_name: 石乙ろぼうし Ishikoro Boushi
description: The person who is wearing the hat will be treated like a pebble; unnoticed.
appears_in: Battle! Cat-Model Robots VS Dog-Model Robots
Doraemon: Nobita's Great Adventure into the Underworld

jp_name: ペコペコバッタ Peko Peko Batta
description:
The Peko Peko Grasshopper will jump into a person's nose to the point of where the target will eventually cry and beg for forgiveness. It may also cause them to be extremely repentful, wishing to forget their past sins and wrongs.
The Peko Peko Grasshopper may be distracted out by forcing the host person sneeze it out (generally with Black Pepper).

jp_name: ペットクリーム
description: Apply it on a rock and then wipe it. After that, it will act like a dog and perform behaviors such as barking. Its diet is composed up of sand and water. The harder you wipe it onto a rock, the gentler the pet would be.

jp_name: 絵本入りこみぐつ Ehon Hairikomi Gutsu
description: With the shoes, a person can enter the world inside a story book. But the user must not interfere with characters or objects inside the story or else the story will end up differently.

jp_name: ポップコーン ハット
description:
This gadget turns people's anger into heat energy to cook popcorn. When someone is angry, the user can use this hat and put it on whoever is angry. The person's anger will transfer to heat and the hat will pop out popcorn, also causing the person to calm down. Different people's anger makes different flavored popcorn which depends on how often their anger is or based on their own cooking skills such as Gian. Nobita, Suneo's popcorn tastes normal, Nobita's mother's popcorn is pretty spicy, Gian's popcorn tastes like his own stew and other things he cooked, which taste awful, and Kaminari's popcorn is arguably the best popcorn tasted.
But if the wearer is angered to the limit, their anger would build up and end up producing a lot a popcorn. But unfortunately, every piece would be burnt to a crisp.
Interestingly, a different flavor is made on every alternate use in the episode Anger Popcorn.
Shizuka is the only character whose flavour is unknown.

jp_name: 返事先取りポスト "Henji sakidori posuto"
description:
Write a letter to the person you want to address. You can write any type of letter such as a love letter. After that, put the letter you have written into this post box, You will immediately receive a reply to the person you sent the letter without having to be accepted by that person. 
Remember!. You have to write the compleate address you want to go to, and it must be accompanied by stamp, so that the letter can be received and immediately get recive a reply. Whether a letter is answered or not depends on the person you are writing to.
appears_in: How to Get a Reply to a Letter You Haven't Sent

jp_name: めんくいカメラMen kui kamera
description:
The device is a camera decorated with roses and an eye. This camera likes beautiful, pretty and cute faces; but hates faces that are considered ugly or funny, which it removes from the developed photos.
This gadget also have a self-sense.

jp_name: パズル貯金箱 Pazuru Chokin-bako
description: This gadget is like a piggy bank made up of labyrinthine building block puzzle pieces of various shapes and colors. It has a slot at the top of it's face.

jp_name: アンケーター Ankētā
description:
It is pink in color and has some buttons on it with a big blue screen at the top. 
This gadget is used to give some questions to someone using his/her DNA.
This is the gadget that was used to know what Shizuka really wanted for her birthday as a gift. Doraemon and Nobita found out that she wanted Sweet Potatoes as a gift on her birthday with the help of this gadget. They plucked one of her hair strands to get her DNA so they could activate this gadget.

eng_name: Rain Man Or Sunny Man Meter
jp_name: 雨男晴れ男メーター "Ameotoko hareotoko mētā"
description: This meter allow you to check that person is a rain man (Ameotoko), or a sunny man (Hareotoko). Not only for a man, this gadget work to a woman like Shizuka-chan.
appears_in: It's Tough To Be a Rain Man

jp_name: ほんもの３Ｄメガネ
description: When wearing it while watching, all of the objects and people there will emerge out of the TV like a 3D dimensional image but if anyone touch the image the real vesion of it will go out of the TV and become real.

jp_name: レプリコッコ Repurikokko
description: First you must scan any object you want it. then there will be eggs that come out from this gadget, after that break the egg with using a hamer and Ta-da. You got a replica or miniature of that object.

jp_name: 辞ニンジン Jininjin
description:
This gadget is used to make someone resign from his/her position.
People who resign because eating this gadget :

jp_name: エイコーノトビラ Eikōno Tobira
description: First a user must tell what problems he/she want to solve and then he/she will go inside the door. To solve his/her issue, an instructor who resides inside the door will give him/her difficult tasks to reach his/her goal. The time inside the door is slower than the real world. The user cannot go back to the real world unless he/she reaches his/her main goal. But there are a few exceptions though. If the instructor is unable to withstand whatever makes him feel weak or sick or something else, then the user will be kicked out instantly and not permitted to return.

jp_name: もどりライト Modori Raito
description: Similar to a torch, when it is pointed to some object, the object that the user points to will be transformed back to its original materials or ingredients. For example, if pointed at a dorayaki, the light will make the dorayaki transform back to ingredients like flour,red bean paste and egg.

jp_name: 復元光線 Fukugen Kōsen
description:
This gadget can be used to repair the defective goods into reusable.
The gadget can restore or do an action as Doraemon demonstrated in Doraemon Came Out! when the gadget did Nobita's homework for him. In Weakness Grasping/(Secret) Spy Operation, it was used to restore Nobita's broken vase.
appears_in: Nobita Express and the Mystery of the Train Hunter

jp_name: さかのぼりボート Sakanobori Bōto
description: The boat can move in the opposite direction of the flow of water.
appears_in: Nobita and the Haunts of Evil
The New Nobita's Great Demon ~Peko and the Exploration Party of 5~
Doraemon: New Nobita's Great Demon ~Peko and the Exploration Party of 5~

description: It used to reverse an attack to backfire/bounce back to the attacker by waving it in front of things coming up.
appears_in: The New Record of Nobita: Spaceblazer

Nobita and the Birth of Japan 2016

jp_name: しゅくテキ Shuku teki
description: If person ate it, he/she will be swelling up and overflowing with competitive spirit.
appears_in: The Mom vs. Rich Mother Battle

jp_name: ロボ子 Robokoユリ子 Yuriko (1973 anime)General informationCasual informationRelationshipsOther DetailsGallery
description:
Roboko (ロボ子 Robo-ko) or Yuriko (ユリ子 Yuri-ko - 1973 only), also known as Robyn in the English Amazon Kindle translation, is a gadget and character brought by Doraemon from the 22nd century.
Yuriko is a robot girl with the appearance of a 10-12 years old girl. She has fair skin, blue eyes and red hair in a yellow bow. She wears a blue dress and boots.
Roboko is a robot girl with the appearance of a 10-12 years old girl. She has fair skin, black eyes and black hair with short trims and bangs with a red ribbon. She wears a pink dress and white boots.
Roboko is a robot girl with the appearance of a 10-12 years old girl. She has fair skin, black eyes and pink hair with short trims and bangs with a red ribbon. She wears a pink dress and white boots.
Roboko is a robot girl with the appearance of a 10-12 years old girl. She has fair skin, brilliant grayish green eyes, green hair with short trims and bangs with a red ribbon. She wears a yellow dress with a pair of red boots.
The red ribbon is a switch that can activate/shut down the whole machine.
As specified by Doraemon, Roboko is supposed to be a friendly robot and also a bodyguard, while the target can be manually specified. However, she often becomes jealous when her target gets drawn away by anything else. She does not display aggression to other robots such as Doraemon.
Roboko is one of the "Secret Base Items" in the game. It can be crafted by collecting からクリナッツ(Chestnut), ?がたコンピューター(? Computer) and ナゾの?かい (? or Mystery).

jp_name: General InformationFunctions
description:
(ロボター)The Robotter is one of Doraemon's gadgets that appears in Moai Statues of Easter Island and its manga counterpart.
This gadget is a yellow canister with a removable lid that houses multiple pink small spheres.
The function of this gadget is to give non-human creatures, human thoughts, feelings, actions, and sometimes even speaking.
appears_in: Doraemon: Nobita's New Great Adventure into the Underworld ~The 7 Magic Users~

jp_name: 石頭 Ishiatama
description:
Rocky Head or Stone Head (石頭 Ishiatama) is one of Doraemon's body parts and sort of a gadget.
Doraemon's head is so heavy that it can destroy everything hard. Despite its indestructibility, Doraemon is still able to feel the pain in his head.
appears_in: Nobita and the Island of Miracles ~Animal Adventure~
Battle! Cat-Model Robots VS Dog-Model Robots

jp_name: ルームガードセット Rūmugādosetto
description:
The contents of a set are as follows:
Once used, the gadget will lock up the room, with the doorway set with "Password Identification Lock" being the only entrance following the password's declaration. Once in the room, the user can exit through the other entrance(s) such as windows, but can only re-enter through the doorway with "Password Identification Lock". Other gadgets such as "Pass Loop" cannot be used to enter the room, as the gadget nullifies their effect.
In addition, according to Doraemon in Nobita's Fried Shrimp, the gadget runs on batteries and thus will cease to function once the batteries have expired, allowing the person(s) that doesn't know the password to safely enter the room.

jp_name: ペタリハンド Petari hando
description:
Rubber Hand or Suction Hand (ペタリハンド Petari hando) is one of Doraemon's body parts and sort of a gadget.
It can stick onto anything without fingers, allowing to pull things, climb up walls and ceilings.
appears_in: Battle! Cat-Model Robots VS Dog-Model Robots

jp_name: 味見スプーン Ajimi Supūn
description: Using the gadget, the user can taste samples of several foods from the magazines, books or pictures. It is very convenient since the user does not have to go very far or spend money just to taste the food. However, the spoon can only be used one time per picture, so if the user wants to taste it again, he/she will need another spoon.

jp_name: General InformationFunctionsDetails
description:
In the 1979 adaptation of the anime, the Scheduler Clock has an orange exterior with black spade-like hands used to prick the user if not abiding to the schedule set.
In the 2006 adaptation, the clock has a red exterior with a yellow slot and blue hands.
The Scheduler Clock is used to plan events of any kind. Once a schedule paper/timetable is inserted in the gadget, it keeps the time that the user does a particular event. However, it is hasty; it forces the user to do the event it planned with the gadget even in bad weather (e.g. in the rain), unsuitable conditions, or even if the task itself is already done. Moreover, the gadget treats the person who inserts the schedule paper/timetable in as the user, so the non-user has to be careful to not putting in the paper under any circumstance.
The following is Doraemon's schedule that was intended for Nobita:

jp_name: 見たままスコープ "Mitama masukōpu"
description: This gadget can help you remember events or footsteps you took by attaching this object to your head. All the scene you saw with your eyes are dug up from the depths of your brain's memories and will be projected on a screen. Then set the time for the event and you will see again what events you have done that day projected on the screen.

jp_name: かげきりばさみ
description:
The Shadow Cutting Scissors can cut a shadow of a person if the shadow's figure is completely visible. Thus, the person whom shadow is about to be cut should stand on a place with good lighting. After the shadow is detached from the person, it will become somewhat 3-dimensional, and animated. The person's shadow is unable to speak, yet docile and obedient in the first 30 minutes. But if the shadow is still around exceeds 30 minutes, it will become smarter, and its blackness will start transforming it into its person. The person is instead, starts to become darker, and more 'shadow-like'. Despite it starting to become more like their person, they are still light-weight, have malleable bodies and incredible naughtiness. The person and the shadow will be switched each other in two hours. The shadow should be immediately bind to the person back using the Shadow Binding Glue. Because a shadow is virtually not physical, one should catch them with the Shadow Capturing Mochi". A person's shadow cut by the Shadow Cutting Scissors has similar personalities with their person. For example, Shadow Nobita is scared of Tamako Nobi's shadow.
Anime
Manga

jp_name: ショックガン Shokku Gan
description:
It is the initial starting weapon in Doraemon for the Famicom.
It only stuns an opponent, not killing them.
appears_in: Nobita and the Haunts of Evil
Nobita and the New Steel Troops ~Angel Wings~
The New Nobita's Great Demon ~Peko and the Exploration Party of 5~
Doraemon: New Nobita's Great Demon ~Peko and the Exploration Party of 5~

jp_name: 六面カメラ Rokumen Kamera
description: Have a copy of a picture with an object and then picture it with the gadget. After that you can have a 3D view of the object; on back, front, left, right or on top.
appears_in: Nobita and the Haunts of Evil
The New Nobita's Great Demon ~Peko and the Exploration Party of 5~
Doraemon: New Nobita's Great Demon ~Peko and the Exploration Party of 5~

jp_name: ネムケスイトール "Nemukesuitōru"
description:
This pistol can relieve your sleepiness by pumping the body of the gun. Just aim at the person you are aiming at, then a sleep bubble will come out of your nose and be absorbed by this weapon, so you will feel less sleepy.
The drowsiness absorbed earlier can be shot at other people. Just fire at the intended target and they will immediately fall asleep for a few moments.

jp_name: スぺルガス
description: Spray it on someone and the one sprayed on will be able to slide on anything.
appears_in: Getting Fired Up! Dorami's Crash Course in Figure Skating

jp_name: スモールライト Sumōru Raito
description:
The Small Light shines a light beam that can reduce the size and mass of anything or anybody it touches. 
It is a green flashlight with a yellow-orange bottom. It has a blue top with four spheres on it, and a glass hemisphere that emits the light beam. It also has two buttons, the red one shrinks the target, while the yellow one serves a reverse setting as it enlarges the target back to normal size.
appears_in: A Visitor from the Country of the Future/U.S. English dub
Even Though It's Inside the Stomach Acid
Doraemon: New Nobita's Great Demon ~Peko and the Exploration Party of 5~
Doraemon: Nobita and the New Steel Troops ~Winged Angels~

jp_name: ふにゃふニャー "Fu nya fu nyā"
description: Any object touched by this cat's hands will become very soft, squishy, and tender, even as hard as iron and stone can be changed by this gadget, it's very nice if you touch it and be on top of it. If you want to return back to normal, just touch it again with this cat's hand.

jp_name: 空間接着剤 Kūkan Setchaku-zai
description: The gadget can glue any object or living thing in air or space.
appears_in: Nobita and the Island of Miracles ~Animal Adventure~

jp_name: 空間ひんまげテープ Kūkan Hinmage Tēpu
description:
The tape is used to bend the reality of dimension and space. Doraemon used on Nobisuke Nobi's employer to keep him out and agitate him to make him leave. The tape is used onto the front door's knob by sticking it into a loop which has be turned once. The tape causes the door to become a warping space that infinite cause the person who went through from the outside to came out outside again.
Simply put, it is used to create an entry that becomes an 'exit' and vice versa.

jp_name: 妖怪クリームセット Yōkai Kurīmu Settoおおかみ男クリーム  Ōkami Otoko Kurīmuドラキュラクリーム Dorakyura Kurīmu雪女クリーム Yuki-onna Kurīmuもどしクリーム Modoshi Kurīmu
description:
This set of gadgets consists of Werewolf Cream, Dracula Cream, Snow Woman Cream, and the Restoring Cream.


Main article: Werewolf Cream
The Werewolf Cream is cream that can make a person become a werewolf.


Main article: Dracula Cream
The Dracula Cream is cream can make a person become Dracula.


Main article: Snow Woman Cream
The Snow Woman Cream is cream can make a person become a snow woman ghost(Yuki-onna).


Main article: Restoring Cream
The Back-to-Normal Cream or Restoring Cream is cream used to return to normal.

jp_name: スパイセット
description: The whole Spy Set looks like a head of a robot with one eye and a left ear. The 'head' has an antenna, which receives transmissions from the eye and ear. Both eye and ear are detachable, and can levitate around. They are small enough to slip into a person's house. The 'mouth of the head' can be opened and functions as the monitor.

jp_name: General InformationFunctionsDetails
description:
In the movie, it appears with a regular brown color around and a dark-brown toe cap on it. In the 2005 anime episode, it has a lighter complexion with orange all around, and a light yellow at the toe cap. The anime version also has small tags at the back of each shoe.
The size of the shoe in the anime was huge, most likely to fit into Doraemon's feet, as he was the only user of this gadget in it.
The wearer of this shoe can jump into any story book and experience its incidents in a realistic manner. The wearer is immune to the elements of the story book, i.e., they cannot drown in water or burn in fire. If taken a look at the pages from outside, the wearer can be seen in the illustrations of the book. This property helped Nobita and Doraemon in the movie, to find out which book Shizuka got stuck in.

jp_name: ストレートホール Sutorēto Hōru
description: The gadget's shape is like the Pass Loop but the function is the same as the Anywhere Door.

jp_name: 糸なし糸電話 Ito Nashi Ito Denwa
description: It can be used to communicate with or hear another person, no matter how far he/she is.
appears_in: Nobita and the New Steel Troops ~Angel Wings~
The String Phone Without a String
The Debut of a New Song! Gian's The Greatest!
Pizza Dumplings Shining in the Night Sky

jp_name: 入れかえロープ
description: if there are two people holds one of the ends of this rope at the same time, their spirits will stay the same, only the bodies will be swapped. However in Stand by Me 2, this gadget has a fatal design flaw, which is that if a person does not return to their original body within 1 hour their memories will be wiped out, along with them passing out. The Substitution Rope was many times used by Doraemon, Nobita and other Tama Friends:

jp_name: 代用シール Daiyō Shīru
description: The stickers allow their user to substitute an item for another by writing that object's name on the sticker, and applying the sticker to an item that they want to "substitute". The item's use is not limited to just objects, and can also be used on buildings, or even people. If the sticker falls off the effect will end.

jp_name: スーパー手袋
description:
Super Gloves allow the user to perform various physical activities with increased strength, similar to Superman. The strength is described "as strong as Hercules".
There is a 1-versus-rivals minigame that hosts this gadget. This mini-game is quite unusual since the soloist has to flee as his opponents hurl rocks at him with the gloves. If a rock touches his body as it falls, the soloist is defeated and the team players win. However, if he manages to escape, the soloist wins.
appears_in: A Girl Like White Lily/2005 Anime
Doraemon: Nobita and the Haunts of Evil
Doraemon: Nobita and the New Steel Troops ~Winged Angels~
Doraemon: New Nobita's Great Demon ~Peko and the Exploration Party of 5~

jp_name: スーパーグルメスパイス
description: When this item is applied to a target, it becomes irresistibly delicious to everyone else, prompting their desire to consume it.

jp_name: スーパー移(い)動(どう)風(ぶ)呂(ろ)1010 Sūpā idō furo sentō
description: Despite its name, the Super Mobile Bath 1010 doesn't offer anything on its own, and must be attached to a bathtub for warp. By pressing the red button, it will display the world map so that the user can choose a country that leads to a place with a beautiful scenery. By pressing the blue button, it returns the user into his/her original place. By pressing the yellow button, it will select a random place and scenery that cannot be stopped unless the user presses the yellow button and the blue button at the same time.

jp_name: タケコプター  Take Koputā
description:
The Take-copter is a small yellow colored gadget consisting of horizontally spinning rooters guided by a thin shaft which connects to a wide base. It can easily fit into a normal pocket present in pants or trousers. Sometimes, it consists of a button at the back or on top.
In 1973 anime, the Take-copter had a wider and conical base and the middle part seemed like an antennae.
In 1979 anime and 2005 anime, it had a semi spherical base and was smaller than the 1973 one.
In Stand by Me Doraemon, it had a brown colored suction cap at the base.
Dorami's Take-copter is generally pink colored.
Mini-Doras' Take-copters look exactly same as Doraemon's but they are very small on the basis of size.




The Take-copter is one of the action gadgets of Doraemon. It allows him to fly around. It uses battery, which recharges when not being used. When it's battery runs out, Doraemon descends slowly yet rather uncontrollably. A player may spam the Y button so that Doraemon may get flight and descends further forward. Unlike in the TV shows, Doraemon cannot use other gadgets whilst flying using the Take-copter and neither he can transform into Nobita, but the player can still summon assist other characters.
It is listed under number 32 out of 61 gadgets in the game.
The Take-copter is a gadget which changes all of the dice's surfaces to 6 dots.
The Take-copter also appears in this game.
The Take-copter also appears in this game.
The name "Take-copter" combines the words take tombo (bamboo dragonfly, the Japanese name for bamboo-copter), and herikoputa, meaning helicopter. It was also used to be called "heri-tombo".
Its Japanese name "Take-copter" (タケコプター) is a portmanteau of タケ' [Translation - "Take"] (Bamboo) and コプター [Translation - "Herikoputaa"] (Helicopter).
Its English name "Hopter" is a portmanteau of Hop and Copter.

jp_name: ねがい七夕ロケット Ragaitetaroketto
description:
To use the Tanabata Rocket, the user must use the tags to write the wish that they want, then attach it to the rocket and launch it to the space.
The comparison of the original (left) and the reverse one (right).

jp_name: 技術手袋 Gijutsu Tebukuro
description:
The fingertips of the gloves are capable of turning into a variety of tools, allowing the wearer to modify, reprogram, and upgrade any type of machinery.  
The gloves are red with metallic fingers. The gloves have a grey band around the hand. 
In “Nobita’s Little Space Wars 2021”.

jp_name: てるてる坊主
description: When the user raises the rod, the rain will stop.

jp_name: テルテルコート Teruterukōto
description:
Teru Teru Costume or Teru Teru Coat is a useless gadget that Nobita snatched when Doraemon is about to throw it away.
One wears the costume when it rains, it looks like that the gadget stopped the rain, but it actually sucks all the rain into the costume.

jp_name: 人生やりなおし機 Do-Over Machine
description: The Do-Over Machine can let the user to do-over machine in "that" age that user wants. However, the machine also keep the user's strengh and IQ.

jp_name: General InformationFunctionsDetails
description:
Stand by Me Doraemon 2The Soul Machine is a gadget used in both Doraemon 2005 anime and Stand by Me Doraemon 2.
The gadget has a suction rope that takes your soul into a machine and travels back to the past inside of your mind.

jp_name: タイムベルト Taimu Beruto
description:
It is yellow in color and it looks flexible and has some buttons on it.
Its function is the same as the Time Machine except that it can't change the user's location.
appears_in: Doraemon: Nobita's Great Adventure in the Antarctic Kachi Kochi

jp_name: タイムボート
description:
Time Boat (タイムボート Taimu Bōto) is a specialized time travelling vehicle used by the Time Patrol agents in the Time Patrol Bon franchise.
In the 1989 anime, only type 2 appeared.

jp_name: 時間カメラ Taimu Kamera
description: It can be used to take pictures of things in the past. You must specify how long ago you want the picture to be from, and then click a photo. The camera will show what the object or area was like in the past

jp_name: タイムふろしき, Taimu Furoshiki
description:
The Time Cloth is capable of manipulating time on whatever it covers in a backward or forward direction.
The item does not need to be fully enclosed over its target to function and doesn't necessarily affect its attachments or certain other attributes. In one episode where Doraemon had hung the item over the drying rack, a stray breeze detaches it and the item ends up blinding Nobi Tamako. who tries to navigate around the house with her sight obstructed. Before Doraemon can notice, Tamako was reverted to her younger self (somewhat resembling Shizuka Minamoto), much to her surprise. Notably, even though her body has regressed, her other items did not, and she still retains her memories, resulting in her walking awkwardly in her oversized clothing.
Time Cloth in Anime
appears_in: The Girl With the Red Shoes
God Robot Extends His Hand of Love!
Doraemon: Nobita's Great Adventure into the Underworld

jp_name: タイムマシン
description:
Time Machine is a gadget of 22nd Century which is used to do time travel.
The Time Machine consists of a computer operator and a panel consisting of few handles and switches. It has minimum one seat for the driver to sit. It also consists of an antennae like projection(s) which collects signals.
Doraemon's Time Machine is the most commonly seen and used time machine in the franchise. It consists of a nearly-square-shaped chassis, with various appliances mounting on it, such as controls, antennae, etc. The machine is magnetically powered. It originally has the capacity to hold up to three people at maximum. But since it had broken down once, Doraemon upgraded the gadget, and it is now able to transport up to five people. It is placed in the upper drawer of Nobita's desk in Nobita's room in Nobi's Residence. In the 1973 anime, Doraemon's Time Machine had two seats like a car's interior and two levers. It was fully purple coloured. The antennae didn't exist.
Pawaemon's Time Machine can be seen in Battle! Cat-Model Robots vs. Dog-Model Robots. The overall appearance of his Time Machine remains the same as Doraemon's except it has different colors.
Dorami's Time Machine is more advanced as compared to Doraemon's. It is more spacious and comfortable from inside. It is an orange (sometimes red) tulip-shaped machine with its leaf-like base. Furthermore, it has three antennae like projections at the top which seems to appear like the pistil of a flower. Dorami's time machine is placed in the mirror of her room.
The thief's Time Machine which appeared as A Visitor from the Country of the Future was black coloured, having a pair of yellow and red lights front and back.
Time Patrol's Time Machines resembles like a police car having black and white colour with a small red tail like bulb which glows at the top. They are shaped like a computer mouse. The word "Police" is written on it's on both sides.
In Doraemon: Nobita's Dinosaur, Black Mask's Time Machine was flat and had his face on it. It had an antenna and a chair. His time hole was rectangular shaped. In Doraemon: Nobita's Dinosaur 2006, his Time Machine was highly advanced and was more comfortable with fewer controls. It was big and wide and was designed like a king's seat. His time hope was hexagonal.

description: With the use of this gadget, a room will act as a time machine and the surroundings will change.
appears_in: The Story of the Old Persimmons

jp_name: 時限バカ弾 Jigen Baka Dan
description: The bomb has a timer that must be activated before it can detonate. If anything was caught in its area of effect, the bomb stupefies its targets, causing them to hallucinate and behave erratically.It affects both humans and machines, while the effect lasts for up to 5 minutes.

jp_name: トビレットペパー "Tobirettopēpā"
description: If you want to go picnic with carrying lot of stuff inside your backpack. This gadget will help you feel more lighter. Just put this thing inside your backpack and you wont get tired, even your going to hiking on the highest mountain. This gadget also allows users to fly by wrapping it around your shoulders and arm,

jp_name: 観光ビジョン ""Kankō bijon""
description:
Tourism Vision or Sightseeing Vision, Is a one of Doraemon gadgets. 
In order to help Nobita to finish his homework because the weather is hot outside. Doraemon take out the Toursim Vision from his pocket. This gadget allows you to change the background or scenery from your room, just select the place you want by adjusting the button and rotate the wheel. Only the scenery changed, but the wide of the room is still same as usual.
appears_in: I Can't Study in the Sahara Desert

jp_name: 列車用すごろくセット Ressha-yō sugoroku setto
description: First the four players must be on the train. The gameplay is the same as Sugoroku except that there are some changes. When a player draws a card, the player must wear the costume stated in the card. To remove the costumes, the train station must be the same as the Japanese character given. For example, Doraemon's card stated that "Go to station O to ponpokorin", if the train passes to the station Okanoue station, Doraemon's costume will be removed.
appears_in: Nobita Express and the Mystery of the Train Hunter

jp_name: まあまあ 棒 Ma Ma Bō
description: User attaches the stick to the target's mouth and says "まあ まあ! (Calm Down! Calm Down!)" and then target calms down. This gadget hides the target's anger inside of his/her body. The target's anger gets stuck inside his/her body and it grows little by little, then it explodes like a volcanic eruption if the user used the gadget too many times on a person.

jp_name: 変身ドリンク Henshin Dorinku
description:
The user must drink the Transformation drink and think of an animal or object he/she wants to transform. If the user has lack of focus, the transformation will consume negative effects. Effect ends after 6 hours.
In an episode called Shizuka Disappeared?!, it introduces the more upgraded version, the Transformation Drink EX (変身ドリンク・ＥＸ Henshin Dorinku Īekkusu) which is can transform a user into he/she desires instantly. After 6 hours, the transformation will be permanent, unlike the original one.
appears_in: The New Nobita's Great Demon ~Peko and the Exploration Party of 5~
Doraemon: New Nobita's Great Demon ~Peko and the Exploration Party of 5~

jp_name: 変身カチューシャ Henshin Kachūsha
description: The gadget gives the wearer girly hairstyle, skirt, pink-cheek, lipstick and long eyelashes. If the wearer tells their fake name while wearing it, the other people know the user with that name. It also hypnotizes people around them into believing the wearer is a girl.

jp_name: ほんやくコンニャク Hon'yaku kon'nyaku
description: If one eats it, the user will be able to speak and understand other languages, has the external effect of the user sounding fluent in the other languages. This edible gadget can also be used to communicate with animals as well.
appears_in: Running Across Time! The Time Borrowing Race
Doraemon: Nobita's Legend of the Sun King
Nobita's New Great Adventure into the Underworld – The Seven Magic Users
Doraemon: Nobita's Great Battle of the Mermaid King
Doraemon: Nobita and the Island of Miracles ~Animal Adventure~
The New Nobita's Great Demon ~Peko and the Exploration Party of 5~
Nobita and the Birth of Japan 2016
Doraemon: Nobita's Great Adventure in the Antarctic Kachi Kochi

jp_name: 正直太郎 Shōjikitarō
description: The Truth Doll truthfully tells the thing a person is thinking in mind to others.

jp_name: 正直電波
description:
The Truth Transmitter (正直電波 Shoki denpa) is the gadget used and owned by Doraemon.
It uses to force a person to tell the truth with its soundwave.
appears_in: Nobita's the Night Before a Wedding

jp_name: テレビとリもち Terebi torimochi
description: This gadget is used to get things from the television. If a person wants something from the television, he or she can get it with the use of the birdlime. You can put the birdlime inside the television, so it comes out of the television with what you want.
appears_in: Calling for Anything in TV Adhesive

jp_name: ウルトラミキサー
description: Stick the two ends at two things. Then turn on the switch and the two things will become one. It also works for something that is alive. For example, Doraemon and Nobita fused to make Nobi-emon. Although it was never shown how it is done, but the effect can be reverted.

eng_name: Ultra Special Mighty Strong Super Armor
jp_name: ウルトラ・スペシャルマイティ・ストロングスーパーよろい Urutora supesharumaiti sutorongusūpā yoroi
description: It is said to be an invisible gadget which only wise people can see, and wearing this armor can make the user invincible. Only thing is, this gadget doesn't exist, but Nobita and Gian believe otherwise and think they have became invincible with the gadget.
appears_in: The Emperor's New Clothes!? Super Armor

jp_name: ウマタケ
description:
To ride an Uma-Take, one should probably tame it first. The Uma-Take is a hasty, impatient and aggressive one, so taming it with carrots is a must. Simply put one foot on the 'step', then the Uma-Take itself will jump around and move quickly like a horse. The sound it made are like normal horse footsteps.
The Uma-Take is Nobita's first gadget in the game. It allows his to move very fast but in a jumping motion. When using it to jump, pressing the Y button(get off the Uma-Take) will make Nobita jumps, enabling him to reach higher places.
The Uma-Take can be used to crush enemies like the Stone Lion and Robo-Mouse by jumping on them. Some enemies cannot be damaged by the Uma-Take, causing Nobita to receive damage instead. The Uma-Take cannot be used underwater.
The Uma-Take is listed under number 4 out of 61 gadgets in the game.
appears_in: The Dora Dora Genpei Battle ~Save Yourself Shizuka-chan!~

jp_name: General InformationFunctionsDetails
description: With this gadget, users will be able to explore the underground. The vehicles can accommodate up to five or six people.
appears_in: Doraemon: Nobita's Great Adventure in the Antarctic Kachi Kochi

jp_name: 水中バギー Suichū BagīGeneral informationCasual informationRelationshipsOther Details
description:
Underwater Buggy (水中バギー Suichū Bagī) or simply Buggy (バギー Bagī) is a character as well as a gadget of Doraemon. He appears in the movie Nobita's Monstrous Underwater Castle and in the video game Doraemon: Giga Zombie no Gyakushū.
Buggy appears as a small red 2-seater vehicle.
He is friendly and is kind-hearted.
Among the characters, Shizuka is the one who gives the most attention to Buggy's friendliness.
He is rather angry Doraemon and always refuses his advice.

jp_name: グレードアップライト Gurēdoappu Raito
description:
This gadget used to make things become real. For example, if the gadget beam a superhero costume, the costume will turn into a real superhero costume and have a certain ability.
The costume that have been beamed:

jp_name: ウラシマキャンディー Urashima Kyandī
description: When eaten, all acts of kindness by the user will be rewarded.

jp_name: 自動販売タイムマシン Jidōhanbai taimu mashin
description: This gadget can sell anything through the time.

jp_name: 声のキャンディー Koe no kyandī
description: First say anything to the mike, this will record one's voice. Then the gadget will turn it into a candy. Get another person to eat the candy and he/she will have the speaker's voice. The effect will wear off after half an hour. He/She can also change into another voice.
appears_in: I'll Become a Singer By Eating Candy

jp_name: コエカタマリン, Koekatamarin
description: When a person drinks the medicine, it solidifies their speech by firing a physical manifestation of the content. For say, if the person shouted 'Ya!', a corresponding Katakana letter 'Ya' (ヤ) will come out. Meanwhile, İf user shouts 'Ro' it will became an object shaped like "ロ". The letter's velocity is slightly slower than sound, and it does bounce off or be absorbed into hard surfaces and soft surfaces respectively (because their properties is rather similar to sound). The letters can maintain their velocity and momentum for a surprising amount of time and so may serve as transportation on their own.
appears_in: Flying Through the Sky on the Letter "ワ"
Move Fast, Doraemon! The Galactic Grandprix
Doraemon: Nobita and the Island of Miracles ~Animal Adventure~
Doraemon: Nobita's Great Adventure in the Antarctic Kachi Kochi

jp_name: のろいのカメラ Noroi no Kamera
description:
When used, Voodoo Camera is able to spawn voodoo dolls relevant to the targeted person.
The spawned voodoo dolls are able to transmit any form of damage inflicted on it to the relevant target. 
It will lead to fatal if used improperly or if in the hands of wrong person.

jp_name: スイカぺン Suika pen
description:
Watermelon Pen is Doraemon's gadget.
Blindfolded Shizuka is splitting watermelons.it used to make anything turn into watermelon.
appears_in: Doraemon Is An Exam Student Now!?

jp_name: お天気コーカン地図 Otenki Kōkan Chizu
description: The gadget can change the weather for a specific place. You need to circle the place (whose weather you want to change) in order to do so.

jp_name: おおかみ男クリーム Ōkami Otoko Kurīmu
description: If the user applies this cream on their face, then they will turn into a werewolf whenever they see a round object (like the moon). To remove the effect, simply wipe the cream off the user's face.
appears_in: Let's Turn Into the Snow Woman on Cold Days!!

jp_name: もしもボックス What-if Box
description:
The user must enter the booth, take the phone off, then say "What if ____?" , then set the phone down. Once this is done, it technically warps the user to an alternate dimension of their current world, while original world and its timeline continue on as usual[1]. Traveling future after using the gadget will result in the user arriving at the same parallel world and not the original world[2], but traveling back to the past will result in the user arriving at the original world prior to the usage of the gadget[3]. 
It is also possible to revert the machine's effects manually by using it with specific commands.
appears_in: Nobita's Great Adventure into the Underworld
Doraemon: Nobita's New Great Adventure into the Underworld – The Seven Magic Users
I'll Be the King of String Finger World
Thank God for the Prison Break
What If We Turn Day Into Night!?

jp_name: ねがい星 Negai Hoshi
description:
The Wishing Star flies to the person calling it and can grant his wishes. However, it is a subject of misunderstandings. For example, if you wish for a baked sea bream (鯛焼き Taiyaki), the gadget gives you a tire (タイヤ Taiya) and a tree (木 Ki).
However, the Wishing Star was useful on one occasion; Nobita uses it to escape Gian and Suneo and it hides him inside a trash bin.

jp_name: きこりの泉 Kikori no Izumi
description: Similar to its mythical namesake counterparts, the Woodcutter's Spring will offer a superior counterpart of an inserted item. It then asks the user which item they dropped, and will either return the updated one to them or withdraw the offer depending if they are honest. Regardless, items within its realm can't be retrieved, and each can only be used for up to 5 times.

jp_name: ころばし屋 Korobashiya
description:
It appears to be a mini gadget version of a normal hit man. It has some large sunglasses, a large dark green hat and a white suit and a tie underneath his green coat. His hands and legs are very small. His hands are similar to Doraemon's. 
The user pays 10 Yen(10 cents in US), declare a name of his/her target. This gadget will then knock that target up for 3 times using it Mini Air Cannon. Once the order has been declared, the Gadget will continuously chase it target until the target has been knock up 3 times. However, the order can be cancelled by paying 100 Yen(1 dollar in US).  
You can input the coins through it's back.
appears_in: Nobita Express and the Mystery of the Train Hunter
The Genius Nobita's Airship Amusement Park

jp_name: ころばし屋Z Korobashiya Zetto
description: The overal appearance of Wrestling Killer Z remains almost the same as Wrestling Killer, with little noticeable changes to its clothing. It has purple sunglasses, hot pink hat, purple coat and Z letter on its white suit.

jp_name: Y(ワイ)ロウ Wai rō
description: The user can persuade people to do what the user wants by bribing them.
